name: t3ma
description: Fetches the Triple Exponential Moving Average (T3MA) for a given financial instrument.

symbol.description: Instrument symbol, which can be any equity, index, ETF, forex, or cryptocurrency (e.g., 'AAPL', 'EUR/USD', 'ETH/BTC').

interval.description: Interval between two consecutive points in the time series. Supported intervals include '1min', '5min', '15min', '30min', '45min', '1h', '2h', '4h', '1day', '1week', and '1month'.

format.description: Format of the response data, either 'CSV' or 'JSON'. Default is 'json'.

v_factor.description: Volume factor used in the calculation of the T3MA.

series_type.description: Type of series to use in the calculation. Supported values are 'open', 'high', 'low', and 'close'. Default is 'close'.

outputsize.description: Number of data points to return. Default is 30.

time_period.description: Number of periods over which to calculate the T3MA. Default is 9.

name: get_animes
description: Retrieves a list of animes based on specified search criteria and filters from the RapidAPI Anime API.

year_greater.description: Find animes released after the specified year.

media_type.description: Filter by media type (e.g., music, tv, ona, ova, movie, special).

year_less.description: Find animes released before the specified year.

status.description: Filter by anime status (e.g., currently_airing, finished_airing, not_yet_aired).

limit.description: Limit the number of results.

q.description: Search for animes by title in English or Japanese.

sort.description: Specify sort order, True for ascending and False for descending.

offset.description: Number of results to skip.

fields.description: Specify the fields to return (e.g., id, title, main_picture, etc.).

year_equal.description: Filter by animes released in the specified year.

source.description: Filter by source material (e.g., manga, visual_novel, novel, etc.).

order.description: Order results by a specific field.

name: list_titles
description: Fetches a listing of titles that match specified parameters from the Watchmode API.

genres.description: Filter results to only include certain genre(s). Pass in a single genre ID or multiple comma-separated IDs. Default is '4,9'.

limit.description: Set how many titles to return per page. Default and maximum is 250.

source_ids.description: Filter the results to titles available on specific sources by passing individual IDs or multiple comma-separated IDs. Default is '23,206'. Note: Only a single region can be set if this is populated.

source_types.description: Filter results to only include titles available on specific types of sources (e.g., subscription, free). Default is 'sub,free'. Note: Only a single region can be set if this is populated.

types.description: Filter results to only include titles available on specific types of sources (e.g., subscription, free). Default is 'sub,free'. Note: Only a single region can be set if this is populated.

regions.description: Filter results to only include sources active in specific regions. Currently supported regions: US, GB, CA, AU. Default is 'US'. Note: Only a single region can be set if source_ids or source_types are populated.

sort_by.description: Sort order of results. Possible values include: relevance_desc, relevance_asc, popularity_desc, popularity_asc, release_date_desc, release_date_asc, title_desc, title_asc. Default is 'relevance_desc'.

page.description: Set the page of results to return. Default is 1.

network_ids.description: Filter results to titles that originally aired on specific TV networks by passing individual IDs or multiple comma-separated IDs. Default is '1,8,12'.

release_date_start.description: Filter results to only include titles released on or after a specific date. Format: YYYYMMDD. Default is 20010101.

release_date_end.description: Filter results to only include titles released on or before a specific date. Format: YYYYMMDD. Default is 20201211.

name: getlistings
description: Retrieve a list of condominiums and townhouses in specified cities of Southwest Florida and the East Coast.

sort.description: Defines how the listings should be sorted. Supported values are 'RELEVANCE' (best match), 'NEWEST' (newest first), 'PRICE_LOW' (cheapest first), and 'PRICE_HIGH' (most expensive first). Default is 'RELEVANCE'.

offset.description: For pagination. Specifies the starting point in the collection of listings. For example, to get the first set of items, set offset to 0. Default is 0.

price_max.description: The maximum price in US dollars for the condos and townhouses. Default is 250,000.

city.description: The name of the city to search within. Supported cities include Cape Coral, Fort Myers, West Palm Beach, Lake Worth, Lantana, Boynton Beach, Delray Beach, Boca Raton, Pompano Beach, Fort Lauderdale, Naples, Tampa, and Saint Petersburg. Default is 'Cape Coral'.

name: autocomplete_search

search_value.description: The phrase to search for, which can be a full title or person name, or a partial phrase. For example, searching for "The sha" will find the movie "The Shawshank Redemption".

search_type.description: Determines the type of search results. 1 includes titles and people (default), 2 includes titles only, 3 includes movies only, 4 includes TV shows only, and 5 includes people only.

countryid.description: An ISO-3166 country code or WikiData ID.

regioncode.description: An ISO-3166 or FIPS region code.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to retrieve. Defaults to None.

hateoasmode.description: Include HATEOAS-style links in results. Defaults to None.

asciimode.description: Display results using ASCII characters. Defaults to None.

nameprefixdefaultlangresults.description: Match on names in the default language if a non-default language is requested when prefix-matching. Defaults to None.

types.description: Only include cities of these types (comma-separated): CITY, ADM2. Defaults to None.

minpopulation.description: Only include cities with at least this population. Defaults to None.

languagecode.description: Display results in this language. Defaults to None.

offset.description: The zero-based offset into the results. Defaults to None.

maxpopulation.description: Only include cities with no more than this population. Defaults to None.

includedeleted.description: Whether to include any cities marked deleted. Options are: ALL, SINCE_YESTERDAY, SINCE_LAST_WEEK, NONE. Defaults to None.

sort.description: How to sort the results. Format: SORT_FIELD,SORT_FIELD where SORT_FIELD = elevation, name, population. Defaults to None.

description: Analyse a given period between start and end dates for a specified country and configuration.

start_date.description: The start date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

end_date.description: The end date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

country_code.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code (2 letters).

end_time.description: The end time in 24-hour format (e.g., '18:15'). Defaults to '18:15'.

start_time.description: The start time in 24-hour format (e.g., '09:14'). Defaults to '09:14'.

profile_id.description: An identifier for a specific profile configuration. Defaults to None.

configuration.description: The name of the preset configuration to be used. Defaults to 'Federal holidays'.

description: Adds a specified amount of working hours to a given start date and time for a specified country.

start_date.description: The start date in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

increment_time.description: The amount of working time to add or remove from the start date and time in 'H:i' format (e.g., '1:00' for one hour, '30:15' for thirty hours and fifteen minutes, or '-0:45' for a negative increment). Defaults to '1815'.

profile_id.description: Optional profile identifier. Defaults to None.

trim.description: The trim level of the car.

page.description: The page number for pagination.

make_model_id.description: The ID for make and model combination.

max.description: Returns results with an ID less than (older than) or equal to the specified ID.

interval.description: The interval between two consecutive points in the time series. Supported values include `1min`, `5min`, `15min`, `30min`, `45min`, `1h`, `2h`, `4h`, `1day`, `1week`, `1month`.

The hierarchical structure of administrative divisions must be respected for accurate results, meaning `admin1` is needed for `admin2`, `admin2` is needed for `admin3`, and so on.

voice_instructions.description: Enables voice instructions for text-to-speech engines. Default is None.

filename.description: The name of the file if the output `format` is `gpx` or `kml`. Default is None.

description: Find nearby places based on the given location, language, radius, and type.

description: Performs a forward geocoding search using a free-form query string and optional parameters to specify query filters and output format.

q.description: Free-form query string for the geocoding search.

countrycodes.description: Two-letter country code as defined in ISO 3166-1 alpha2 to restrict search to a specific country.

json_callback.description: Name of JSON callback function for JSONP calls; use this when the format is set to JSON.

polygon_text.description: Include a textual representation of the polygon geometry in the output.

namedetails.description: Include detailed naming information in the output.

limit.description: Limit the number of search results.

viewbox.description: Specify a bounding box for the search area in the format 'x1,y1,x2,y2', where x is longitude and y is latitude.

format.description: Output format of the response (e.g., JSON).

polygon_geojson.description: Include GeoJSON representation of the polygon geometry in the output.

bounded.description: Use '1' to restrict the search area to the specified viewbox.

polygon_svg.description: Include SVG representation of the polygon geometry in the output.

polygon_kml.description: Include KML representation of the polygon geometry in the output.

polygon_threshold.description: Simplification threshold for the polygon geometry.

accept_language.description: Set the query and response language using two-letter language codes (e.g., 'en' or 'es') or a combination of language and region code (e.g., 'en-GB' or 'es-AR'). Default is 'en'.

addressdetails.description: Include detailed address information in the output.

name: namebydomain

monosemous.description: Whether to only return monosemous entries.

Format is YYYYMMDD (e.g., 20210101 for January 1st, 2021), or YYYYMMDDHHMMSS for more granular results (e.g., 20210101123459 for January 1st, 2021 12:24pm and 59 seconds). Hours are in 24-hour format and in Eastern Standard Time. Defaults to None.

limit.description: Number of titles to return per page. Default is 50, maximum is 250.

end_date.description: End date to include changes from a specific date range. Format is YYYYMMDD (e.g., 20210101 for January 1st, 2021), or YYYYMMDDHHMMSS for more granular results (e.g., 20210101123459 for January 1st, 2021 12:24pm and 59 seconds). Hours are in 24-hour format and in Eastern Standard Time. Defaults to None.

regions.description: 2-character region code (e.g., US) for the country to get titles with changed sources from. Defaults to 'US,CA'.

types.description: Filter result to include only certain types of titles. Pass a single type or multiple types comma delimited. Possible values: 'movie', 'tv_series', 'tv_special', 'tv_miniseries', 'short_film'. Defaults to 'movie,tv_series'.

page.description: Page of results to return. Defaults to 1.

kml.description: KML data to include on the map. Format is `{kml}?{attribute}={value}[&{attribute}={value} ...]`.

format.description: File format of the map image. Default is 'png'.

marker.description: Marker to include on the map. Format is `{attribute}:{value}[|{attribute}:{value} ...]`.

name: medprice

interval.description: Interval between two consecutive points in the time series. Supported values are `1min`, `5min`, `15min`, `30min`, `45min`, `1h`, `2h`, `4h`, `1day`, `1week`, `1month`.

symbol.description: Instrument symbol such as equity, index, ETF, forex, or cryptocurrency. Examples include `AAPL`, `EUR/USD`, `ETH/BTC`.

format.description: Response format. Can be `CSV` or `JSON`. Defaults to `json`.

outputsize.description: Number of data points in the response. Defaults to `30`.

endtime.description: The end time for the data in ISO 8601 format. Defaults to None.

limit.description: The number of data points to retrieve. Defaults to 500 and maximum allowed is 1000.

scale.description: The scale of the map. Defaults to None.

type.description: The type of the map (e.g., 'hybrid'). Defaults to 'hybrid'.

name: chat_gpt_detector
description: Detects whether the given text was generated by an AI model using the provided RapidAPI key.

text.description: The text to be analyzed for AI-generated content.
text.default: Christmas is one of the most widely celebrated holidays in the world. It is a time of joy, love, and giving, and is traditionally celebrated on December 25th every year. The holiday has its roots in Christianity, where it commemorates the birth of Jesus Christ, but it is now celebrated by people of all religions and cultures.  Christmas is a time when families and friends come together to celebrate and enjoy each other's company. It is a time to share meals, exchange gifts, and participate in various traditions and activities. One of the most beloved traditions of Christmas is decorating a Christmas tree. This tradition originated in Germany and has since spread around the world. Families often decorate their trees with lights, ornaments, and tinsel.  Another beloved tradition is the exchange of gifts. Many people spend weeks or even months searching for the perfect gift for their loved ones. Giving and receiving gifts is a way to show love and appreciation for one another, and it is a way to bring joy to those around us.  Christmas is also a time for giving back to those in need. Many people donate their time, money, or resources to charities and organizations that help those who are less fortunate. This spirit of giving is one of the most important aspects of Christmas and helps to spread love and kindness to those who need it most.  In addition to these traditions, there are many other customs associated with Christmas. These include caroling, baking Christmas cookies, and watching Christmas movies. Each of these traditions brings a unique sense of joy and excitement to the holiday season.  In conclusion, Christmas is a time of joy, love, and giving. It is a time to come together with friends and family and celebrate the holiday season. While the holiday has its roots in Christianity, it is now celebrated by people of all cultures and religions around the world. Christmas traditions bring people together and create memories that will last a lifetime.

name: forecast_weather_api
description: Fetches weather forecast and alerts from a weather API.

q.description: Query parameter to specify the location. It can be:

days.description: Number of days of weather forecast required, with a default of 3 days.

dt.description: Specific date for the forecast in 'yyyy-MM-dd' format. Must be between today and the next 10 days.

lang.description: Desired language for the 'condition:text' field in the response.

name: validate_username
description: Validates an Instagram username using the Toolbench RapidAPI service.

username.description: The Instagram username to be validated.

name: full_data
description: Fetches data from the RapidAPI based on the provided keyword, optional full data, and API key parameters.

keyword.description: The keyword to search for in the API.

fulldata.description: Optional parameter to specify the type of full data. Defaults to 'digital marketing'.

name: temperature_from_to_number
description: Converts a temperature value from one unit to another using the RapidAPI Unit Conversion API.

to.description: The target temperature unit.

number.description: The temperature value to be converted.

is_from.description: The original temperature unit.

name: query_for_city_boundary_by_name
description: Queries the city boundary information by the given city name using the Boundaries API.

name.description: The name of the city for which to query boundary information.

name: gettimezone
description: Fetches the local timezone information for a specified geographic location using latitude and longitude.

longitude.description: The geographic longitude coordinate of the location.

latitude.description: The geographic latitude coordinate of the location.

name: get_from_yts
description: Fetches torrent data from YTS for a given search topic using RapidAPI.

searchtopic.description: The topic or keyword to search for on YTS.

name: forex_history_data_deprecated
description: Fetches historical forex data for a given currency pair using the RapidAPI service.

pair_id.description: The identifier for the currency pair whose historical data is to be fetched.

name: playlist_videos
description: Fetches videos from a specified YouTube playlist using the RapidAPI service.

cursor.description: The cursor token for paginated results (default is None).

is_id.description: The playlist ID (default is 'PLcirGkCPmbmFeQ1sm4wFciF03D_EroIfr').

name: get_coverage
description: Retrieves cell coverage information for major US carriers (AT&T, T-Mobile, U.S. Cellular, and Verizon) based on the provided zip code.

postcode.description: The zip code for which to retrieve cell coverage information.

name: retrieve_specific_queue_time
description: Retrieve a specific queue item based on the given ID from the unofficial Efteling API.

is_id.description: The ID of the specific queue item to retrieve.

name: getrandomsolution
description: Fetches a JSON data consisting of a random optimal solution for a given cube position.

position.description: The cube position for which to retrieve the random optimal solution.

name: companies_id_jobs
description: Retrieves the latest job postings for a given company identifier since a specified timestamp.

is_id.description: The identifier of the company.

since.description: A timestamp to filter job postings. Defaults to '2017-01-01'.

size.description: The maximum number of job postings to return. Defaults to 100.

name: getpostcode
description: Retrieve details for a given UK postcode using the RapidAPI service.

postcode.description: The UK postcode to be queried.

name: stock_get_total_revenue
description: Fetches the total revenue for a given stock symbol from the specified region using the Toolbench RapidAPI service.

symbol.description: The ticker symbol of the stock (e.g., "AAPL" for Apple Inc.).

region.description: The region code to fetch the stock data from. Allowed values are 'US', 'BR', 'AU', 'CA', 'FR', 'DE', 'HK', 'IN', 'IT', 'ES', 'GB', 'S'. Defaults to None.

name: vin_decode
description: Decodes a given Vehicle Identification Number (VIN) using the RapidAPI VIN Decoder service.

vin.description: The Vehicle Identification Number to decode.

name: newspaper_company_filter_for_news
description: Fetches news articles from a specified newspaper company using RapidAPI.

newspaperid.description: The ID of the newspaper company to filter news from.

name: cci
description: Fetches the Commodity Channel Index (CCI) for a given symbol at a specified interval from the Twelve Data API.

symbol.description: The instrument symbol, which can be any equity, index, ETF, forex, or cryptocurrency (e.g., `AAPL`, `EUR/USD`, `ETH/BTC`).

interval.description: The interval between two consecutive points in the time series. Supported intervals are `1min`, `5min`, `15min`, `30min`, `45min`, `1h`, `2h`, `4h`, `1day`, `1week`, and `1month`.

outputsize.description: The number of data points to retrieve. The default is `30`.

time_period.description: The time period for calculating the CCI. The default is `20`.

format.description: The format of the returned data. Accepted values are `csv` or `json`. The default is `json`.

name: transaction
description: Fetches full data for a specific transaction on the Optimism blockchain.

hash.description: The hash of the transaction to scan.

network.description: The network to use (mainnet or testnet). Defaults to None.

name: specifications_by_make_model
description: Fetches the specifications of a motorcycle given its make and model using the Motorcycle Specs Database API.

name: single_airplane
description: Fetches details of a single airplane using its ID from the Airplane Database API.

is_id.description: The ID of the airplane to retrieve details for.

name: consulta_estabelecimento
description: Queries the CNPJ for unified information from Receita Federal, Simples Nacional, and Cadastro de Contribuintes.

cnpj.description: The CNPJ number to be queried.

maxage.description: Maximum age of the cached data in days. Defaults to 30.

simpleshistory.description: Whether to include historical data from Simples Nacional. Defaults to None.

registrations.description: UFs separated by commas to include information from Cadastro de Contribuintes. Use 'BR' to consider all. Defaults to 'BR'.

simples.description: Whether to include current data from Simples Nacional. Defaults to None.

name: videocategories
description: Fetches video categories from the YouTube API based on provided parameters.

part.description: Specifies the videoCategory resource properties that the API response will include. Typically set to 'snippet'.

is_id.description: A comma-separated list of video category IDs to retrieve. Default is None.

regioncode.description: Instructs the API to return the list of video categories available in the specified country, given by an ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code. Default is 'US'.

hl.description: Specifies the language that should be used for text values in the API response. Default is 'en_US'.

name: getchanneldetails
description: Fetch detailed information and insights about a specific YouTube channel using its ID.

is_id.description: The unique ID of the YouTube channel to fetch details for.

name: dividends
description: Retrieve the amount of dividends paid out for a given stock symbol within specified dates and other optional parameters.

symbol.description: The stock symbol for which to retrieve dividend information.

start_date.description: The start date for the dividend data in YYYY-MM-DD format. Defaults to None.

end_date.description: The end date for the dividend data in YYYY-MM-DD format. Defaults to None.

country.description: The country of the stock exchange. Defaults to None.

range.description: The range for the dividend data. Example: '6m' for six months. Defaults to '6m'.

exchange.description: The stock exchange where the symbol is listed. Defaults to None.

name: mediainfo
description: Fetch media information from Instagram using the provided short code.

short_code.description: The short code of the Instagram media post.

name: companies_id_financials_exists
description: Checks if financial key figures for a company with the given identifier are available and returns the list of years for which these figures are available.

is_id.description: The identifier of the company to check for financial data.

name: query
description: Queries information about an IP address using the NetDetective API.

ipaddress.description: The IP address to use for the query. Defaults to None, which uses the IP address of the connecting client.

name: get_callback_url_status
description: Check the status of a callback URL to determine if it can receive scan results via POST requests.

callback_url.description: The URL to be checked for its ability to receive scan results.

name: about_channel
description: Fetches detailed information about a YouTube channel using its ID.

is_id.description: The ID of the YouTube channel for which information is being fetched.

name: year_fractions
description: Calculates the year fraction between two dates based on the specified day count convention using the RapidAPI service.

start_date.description: The start date of the period in YYYY-MM-DD format.

end_date.description: The end date of the period in YYYY-MM-DD format.

dcc_types.description: The day count convention to be used for the calculation (e.g., '30/360', 'ACT/360', etc.).

name: get_user_id_by_username
description: Fetch the Instagram user ID associated with a given username.

username.description: The Instagram username for which the user ID needs to be retrieved.

name: api_userinfo
description: Fetches the avatar, followers count, likes count, and videos count of a TikTok user by user ID.

is_id.description: The ID of the TikTok user.

name: kunyomi_reading
description: Searches for kanji characters using the provided kunyomi reading.

kun.description: The kunyomi reading of the kanji character, specified in Hiragana or romaji.

name: single_strain
description: Fetches detailed information for a single strain by its ID using the Weed Strain API.

is_id.description: The ID of the strain for which details are to be fetched.

name: city_data
description: Fetches a list of cities using the Toolbench RapidAPI.

count.description: The number of cities to retrieve. Defaults to 10. Maximum value is 1000.

name: get_watches_by_brand_family_model
description: Fetches a list of watches based on brand name, family, and model using the provided RapidAPI key.

brandname.description: The brand name of the watch.

model.description: The model name of the watch.

family.description: The family category of the watch.

name: image_stable_prompter
description: Generates a prompt for stable diffusion using an image URL via the Toolbench RapidAPI.

url.description: The full path of the image URL to be processed. Defaults to None.

name: random_mlem
description: Fetches one random mlem image in JSON format based on the given optional parameters.

tag.description: Tag to filter the mlem images.

orientation.description: Orientation of the image, can be 'square', 'landscape', or 'portrait'.

name: address_autosuggest
description: Fetches address suggestions based on a partial or complete address query using the Address Autosuggest API.

query.description: The partial or complete text of the address to search for suggestions.

name: tts
description: Converts given text to speech in the specified language and returns the result in .mp3 format using the RapidAPI service.

text.description: The text to be converted to speech.

lang.description: Language code for the speech conversion. Defaults to 'en'.

name: get_plus_one
description: This function takes an integer `number` and uses the RapidAPI service to get the number incremented by one.

number.description: The integer to be incremented.

name: netherlands_songs
description: Fetch the Netherlands Songs chart information from the Billboard API.

range.description: The range of the chart to fetch.

date.description: The date of the chart in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

name: get_range_of_verses
description: Fetches a collection of Ayahs/Verses from a specific chapter/surah of the Quran along with original Arabic text, translation, transliteration, and verse ID in JSON format using the RapidAPI service.

chapterid.description: The ID of the chapter/surah to retrieve.

range.description: The range of verses to fetch (e.g., "1-10").

name: airports_by_keyword
description: Fetches a list of airport names and their IATA codes that match the given keyword.

keyword.description: A search term to match against airport names and IATA codes.

name: totd_tracks_by_page
description: Fetches the Track of the Day (TOTD) tracks from the Trackmania API by page number.

page.description: The page number of results to retrieve. Default is 0.

name: resources_allcontries
description: Retrieves a list of important economic resources for a specified African country using the RapidAPI service.

country_name.description: The name of the African country for which to retrieve the economic resources.

name: company_details
description: Fetch details of a company from Indeed's API.

company_id.description: The unique identifier of the company to fetch details for.

locality.description: The locality or country code for Indeed's subdomain. Default is 'us' if not provided.

name: stock_calendar_events
description: Fetches calendar events for a specified stock symbol using the Yahoo Finance API.

symbol.description: The stock symbol for which to retrieve calendar events.

name: symbol
description: Fetches stock data for a given ticker symbol from the RapidAPI service.

symbol.description: The ticker symbol of the stock to retrieve data for.

name: getbookcoverurl
description: Fetches the URL of a book cover image using the provided language code and ISBN.

languagecode.description: The language code in which the book cover information is required.

isbn.description: The International Standard Book Number (ISBN) of the book.

name: get_individual_news_sources
description: Fetches cryptocurrency news from a specific news source using the provided API key.

newspaperid.description: The ID of the specific news source to fetch news from.

name: getpopulationbycountrycode
description: Fetches the population data of a specified country using its ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 country code.

countrycode.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 code representing the country.

name: search_exact_phrase_api
description: Searches the King James Version (KJV) of the Bible for the exact phrase supplied and returns the result.

phrase.description: The exact phrase to search for in the KJV Bible.

name: laptops
description: Retrieves information about laptops from the Amazon API using optional brand name filtering.

name_brand.description: The brand name to filter the laptops by. If not provided, all laptop brands will be considered.

name: stock_get_annual_avg_div_yield
description: Fetches the annual average dividend yield for a given stock symbol.

symbol.description: The ticker symbol of the stock (e.g., "AAPL" for Apple Inc.).

region.description: The region code for the stock market. Default is 'US'. Allowed values are 'US', 'BR', 'AU', 'CA', 'FR', 'DE', 'HK', 'IN', 'IT', 'ES', 'GB', 'S'.

name: get_ios_app
description: Fetches a specific iOS app's details using the app ID from the iOS Store API.

is_id.description: The ID of the iOS app to fetch.

name: video_search
description: Search for videos based on the specified criteria and return the list of matching videos.

query.description: The search term to be used for finding videos.

site.description: The specific site to search for videos. Defaults to None.

timeout.description: Timeout duration in milliseconds for the request. Defaults to 5000.

page.description: The page number for pagination. Defaults to 1.

filter.description: Filter criteria for the search results. Defaults to None.

quality.description: Minimum quality of the videos to be searched. Defaults to None.

name: title_get_sound_tracks
description: Fetches the sound tracks for a specific title from the online movie database.

tconst.description: The title identifier, which should start with 'tt' (e.g., 'tt0944947'), typically obtained from the /title/auto-complete or /title/find endpoints.

name: genderify_v3
description: Predict and detect the gender (male or female) based on the given name or email address using the Genderify API. Names are supported in over 160 countries.

text.description: The name or email address to analyze for gender prediction.

name: ranking_current
description: Retrieves the current ranking from the SofaScores API using the given ranking type and RapidAPI key.

ranking.description: The type of ranking to retrieve.

name: nhl_picks
description: Retrieves the NHL PickCenter data for a specified game using the NHL API.

is_id.description: The ID of the NHL game for which PickCenter data is requested.

name: telegram_channel_info
description: Fetch realtime information about a public Telegram Channel.

name: ayah_recitations
description: Fetches the list of recitations for a specific Ayah by its key and recitation ID.

ayah_key.description: The key of the Ayah, which is a combination of the Surah number and Ayah number (e.g., '1:1' for the first Ayah of the first Surah).

name: get_language_by_id
description: Fetches language details from the FluentMe API using a given language ID.

language_id.description: The unique identifier for the language to be fetched.

name: constructors_standings
description: Retrieve constructor standings for a specified F1 championship year.

year.description: The year of the F1 championship to retrieve standings for. Defaults to 2005.

name: tour_rankings
description: Fetches the player rankings for a specific golf tour and season.

tour_id.description: The identifier for the particular golf tour.

season.description: The year representing the season of the golf tour.

name: v1_geocoding
description: Fetches geolocation information of a specified city using the API Ninjas Geocoding API.

city.description: The name of the city to geocode.

country.description: The country name, 2-letter ISO country code, or 3-letter ISO country code.

state.description: The US state (for United States cities only).

name: topic_news_by_section
description: Fetches news articles based on a specific section and topic.

section.description: The news section to search within.

topic.description: The topic for which to get news headlines.

lang.description: The language to use for the results, specified as a 2-letter language code (default is 'en').

country.description: The country code to filter the news by country (default is 'US').

name: get_date_and_time_by_city
description: Get the current date and time for a specified city.

city.description: Name of the city to get the date and time for.

name: gettechdomains
description: Retrieve the domains that use a specific technology.

tech.description: The name of the technology to search for.

name: listar_todos
description: Fetch a list of all ministries and subsecretariats using the specified API.

todos.description: The endpoint to retrieve the list of ministries and subsecretariats.

name: i18nlanguages
description: Fetches a list of application languages that the YouTube website supports via the RapidAPI YouTube v3.11 endpoint.

part.description: Specifies the **i18nLanguage** resource properties that the API response will include. Set the parameter value to **snippet**.

hl.description: Specifies the language that should be used for text values in the API response. Defaults to 'en_US'.

name: get_team_win_data
description: Returns the win/loss data for all NFL teams for a specified year.

year.description: The year for which to retrieve the win/loss data. Must be between 1920 and the current year.

name: data_country
description: Fetch data related to sports odds based on the provided parameters.

package.description: The package to use in the query string.

sportid.description: The ID of the sport (e.g., 1, 2, 3) or 0 for all sports.

name: get_live_games
description: Fetches the list of all live games for a given sport along with their current status and score using the ViperScore API.

sport.description: The type of sport for which to retrieve live games (e.g., 'football', 'basketball').

name: getweatherforecast
description: Fetches the weather forecast for a given location over a specified number of days.

location.description: The name of the city or location for which to retrieve the weather forecast.

days.description: The number of days of forecast data to retrieve. Defaults to 3. The range of days is from 1 to 16.

name: alerts
description: Fetches severe weather alerts for a specified location using GPS coordinates or place ID.

place_id.description: Identifier of a place obtained from the 'Location' endpoints. If provided, it takes precedence over lat and lon.

lat.description: Latitude of the location, with defaults to '45.74846'. This can be in formats like 12N, 12.3N, -13.4. Ignored if place_id is provided.

lon.description: Longitude of the location, with defaults to '4.84671'. This can be in formats like 12E, 12.3E, -13.4. Ignored if place_id is provided.

language.description: Language of text summaries. Supported languages are:

timezone.description: Timezone for date fields in the response. Default is 'auto', which uses the local timezone of the location. Format follows the tzinfo database (e.g., 'Europe/Prague', 'UTC').

name: related
description: Fetch related shows for a given show identifier using the RapidAPI service.

show_slug.description: The unique identifier or slug of the show for which related shows are to be fetched.

name: v1_dadjokes
description: Fetch one or more random dad jokes from the API Ninjas Dad Jokes API endpoint.

limit.description: The number of jokes to return. Must be a string representing a number between 1 and 10. Default is None.

name: getcountrycode
description: Retrieves all available country codes using the specified API.

getcountrycodes.description: A flag to specify whether to retrieve country codes. Defaults to 'true'.

name: actors_get_interesting_jobs
description: Retrieves interesting jobs for a specified actor or actress using the RapidAPI service.

nconst.description: The unique identifier for the actor/actress, which should start with "nm" (e.g., "nm0001667"). This can typically be found using the /actors/list-born-today or /actors/list-most-popular-celebs endpoints.

name: movies_get_dvds
description: Fetches a list of DVDs based on the specified type of movie using the Flixster API.

typemovie.description: The type of movie to filter DVDs by. Can be one of the following: 'NEW_RELEASE' or 'COMING_SOON'. Default is 'NEW_RELEASE'.

name: get_quotes_by_source
description: Fetches quotes from a given source using the Quotes API on RapidAPI.

source.description: The source from which to fetch quotes.

name: detailed_cake_recipe_by_id
description: This function retrieves a detailed cake recipe based on a given recipe ID from the RapidAPI service.

is_id.description: The ID of the cake recipe to retrieve.

name: dinner_ingredient
description: Retrieves a random dinner recipe containing the specified ingredient.

ingredient.description: The ingredient which the recipe should include.

name: icecream_ingredient
description: Fetches a random ice cream recipe that includes a specified ingredient.

ingredient.description: The specific ingredient to include in the ice cream recipe search.

name: token
description: Generates an OAuth token from the RapidAPI 'OAuth Echo' endpoint.

client_secret.description: The client's secret key. Defaults to None.

client_id.description: The client's ID. Defaults to None.

name: brands_detail
description: Fetch detailed information about a brand using the provided brand ID.

is_id.description: The ID of the brand to fetch details for. This value should be obtained from the brands `id` field returned in the `/search` endpoint or the `brandId` field returned in the `/products/list` or `/products/detail` endpoints.

name: draw_date_listing
description: Fetches a listing of Thai lottery draw dates from the RapidAPI service.

page.description: The page number of the results to fetch. Defaults to 1.

name: single_dog_breed
description: Fetches details of a single dog breed from the DogBreedDB API.

is_id.description: The ID of the dog breed to fetch details for.

name: medias
description: Retrieves media posts from a specified Instagram user using the Instagram RapidAPI.

user_id.description: The ID of the Instagram user whose media posts are to be retrieved.

batch_size.description: The number of media posts to retrieve in a single batch, ranging from 1 to 50. Defaults to 20.

next_cursor.description: The cursor for fetching the next set of media posts in pagination. Defaults to None.

name: getlivenow
description: Fetches live sports betting data from the specified API.

skinname.description: The name of the skin to filter the live data (default is 'betbiga').

name: premier_league_standings
description: Fetches the Premier League standings data for a given season using the RapidAPI Premier League Standings API.

season.description: The season for which the standings are to be retrieved, specified as a string (e.g., '2022'). If not provided, the current season's standings will be fetched.

name: validate_email_address
description: Validate if an email address is deliverable and working using the Toolbench RapidAPI service.

email.description: The email address to be validated.

name: products_id
description: Fetches product information from AliExpress using the given product ID and various optional filters.

is_id.description: The unique identifier for the product on AliExpress.

page.description: The page number for paginated results. Default is 1.

currency.description: The currency code to use for the prices.

sort.description: The sorting order for the search results.

pricemax.description: The maximum price limit for filtering. Default is 100.

country.description: The country code for filtering the products based on shipping.

pricemin.description: The minimum price limit for filtering. Default is 20.

issale.description: Filter to show only products on sale.

locale.description: The locale code for the results.

isfreeship.description: Filter to show only products with free shipping.

isfavorite.description: Filter to show only favorite products.

name: search_memes
description: Search for memes based on specified criteria.

media_type.description: The type of content to search for. Can be 'image', 'video', or specific formats such as 'jpg', 'png', 'gif', or 'mp4'. Defaults to 'image'.

keywords_in_image.description: Whether the keywords should be found in the meme's image. Defaults to None.

keywords.description: A comma-separated list of keywords to search for. Defaults to 'rocket'.

min_rating.description: The minimum rating the results should have, between 0 and 10. Defaults to 3.

number.description: The number of results to retrieve, between 1 and 10. Defaults to 3.

name: get_play_by_play
description: Fetch the NHL game play-by-play data for a specified game.

is_id.description: The unique identifier for the NHL game.

name: get_fuel_economy_information
description: Fetches fuel economy information for a specified vehicle from the official U.S. government source.

model.description: The vehicle model. Use the /models endpoint to get supported models for the specified make.

make.description: The vehicle make. Use the /makes endpoint to get supported makes.

year.description: Model year. Currently supports model years from 1985 to 2023. Defaults to '2023'.

name: nhl_schedules
description: Retrieves NHL schedule data for a specified date.

day.description: The day of the desired schedule in 'DD' format.

month.description: The month of the desired schedule in 'MM' format.

year.description: The year of the desired schedule in 'YYYY' format.

name: flag
description: Retrieves the flag image of a specified country using the RapidAPI service.

country.description: The country ISO code or the full name of the country in English.

name: getcountrybynumber
description: Retrieves country information based on a phone number using the Telephone to Country API.

q.description: The phone number to search for the corresponding country information.

name: searchcnit
description: Fetches information related to a French vehicle identification number (CNIT) using the specified license plate and function.

plate.description: The vehicle license plate number to search for. Defaults to '021A13'.

function.description: The specific API function to call. Defaults to 'getktypefornumplatefrancemineplate'.

name: video_recommendation
description: Fetches a list of recommended videos based on a provided YouTube video ID.

video_id.description: The YouTube video ID for which recommendations are to be fetched.

name: patreon
description: Check the availability of a given username on Patreon using the Toolbench RapidAPI service.

username.description: The username to be checked on Patreon.

name: get_tiktok_video_info
description: Fetches detailed information about a TikTok video, including options for HD quality and no watermark.

url.description: The URL of the TikTok video. It can be in the format of a TikTok ID or a direct TikTok video link.

name: youtube_search
description: Searches for YouTube videos based on a keyword and various optional parameters.

query.description: The keyword to search for.

lang.description: The language code for the search results. Defaults to 'en'.

order_by.description: The sorting order of the search results. Possible values: 'last_hour', 'today', 'this_week', 'this_month', 'this_year'. Defaults to 'this_month'.

country.description: The country code for the search results. Defaults to 'us'.

name: currency_time_series
description: Retrieve forex time series data for a specified period.

period.description: The period for which the time series data should be returned. Valid periods include:

to_symbol.description: A 3-letter currency code representing the target currency (ISO 4217).

from_symbol.description: A 3-letter currency code representing the base currency (ISO 4217).

language.description: The language code (ISO 639-1) for the results. Default is 'en'.

name: produce_mixy_words_list
description: Generates a list of random words based on the specified amount and difficulty level by querying the Mixy Word Guess API.

amount.description: The number of words to generate. Valid values are integers between 1 and 100. Default is 10.

difficulty.description: The difficulty level of the words. Valid values are "easy", "medium", and "hard". Default is 'easy'.

name: country_details
description: Fetches the details for a specific country from the GeoDB API, including information on the number of regions.

countryid.description: An ISO-3166 country code or WikiData id representing the country.

asciimode.description: If set to True, display results using ASCII characters.

languagecode.description: The language code to display the results in the specified language.

name: search_video_list_by_keywords
description: Search for videos on TikTok by specified keywords and additional filtering options.

sort_type.description: Criterion for sorting results. Defaults to '0'.

publish_time.description: Time filter for when videos were posted. Defaults to '0'.

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for navigating results. Defaults to '0'.

region.description: ISO region code to filter results by location. Defaults to 'US'.

count.description: Number of results to retrieve. Defaults to '10'.

name: movies
description: Fetches the basic metadata for all movies available for playback in a specific region. The results can be sorted by popularity or in alphabetical order.

limit.description: Number of records to return per request. Optional, default is 5, and the maximum is 100.

sources.description: Filter records by source. Multiple sources can be comma-separated. Optional, default is 'netflix,hulu'. Possible values include free, tv_everywhere, subscription, purchase, and specific sources such as netflix or hulu.

region.description: Filter results by region. Optional, default is 'US'. Possible values include 'US', 'FR'.

offset.description: Number of records to skip. Optional, default is 0.

sort.description: Method to sort the records. Optional, default is 'popularity'. Possible values are 'alphabetical' and 'popularity'.

name: brazil_songs
description: Fetches the Brazil Songs chart information for a given date and range.

range.description: The range of chart data to retrieve.

name: get_2_stockdetails
description: Fetch detailed information about a specific stock using the StockYAPI Exchange API.

keyword.description: The stock ticker or keyword to search for. Default is 'GOOG'.

name: get_exchange_pairs
description: Retrieves the top 100 exchange pairs for a given exchange ID.

name: models
description: Search for car models based on various criteria such as year, make, model, make_id, and more. The results can be customized using different parameters to limit, sort, and filter the data.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to return.

make_id.description: The ID of the car make to filter the results.

year.description: The year to filter the car models.

page.description: The page number for paginated results.

sort.description: The field to sort the results by. Default is 'id'.

make.description: The car make to filter the results.

model.description: The car model to filter the results.

direction.description: The direction for sorting ('asc' or 'desc'). Default is 'asc'.

verbose.description: Whether to include detailed information like make, model, and trim. Default is 'yes'.

name: us_al
description: Fetch the current or historical gas price data for Alabama.

date.description: The date for which to retrieve historical gas price data in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'. If not provided, the current gas price data is fetched.

name: racecards

date.description: The date for which to fetch the racecards in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format. Defaults to '2021-06-05' if not provided.

name: random_profiles

name: comments_get
description: Fetch comments for a specific song from the database.

lyric_title.description: The title of the song, track, or lyric.

sm_lid.description: The song's lyric ID. If provided, this bypasses `artist_name` and `lyric_title`. Defaults to None.

parent_id.description: When specified, the method will return any replies for the parent comment. Defaults to None.

type.description: The type of comments to return. Defaults to 'all'.

page.description: The starting page of comments. Defaults to '1'.

page_size.description: The number of comments returned per page. Defaults to '25'.

page_order.description: The field to order the comments by (e.g., 'date' or 'rating'). Defaults to 'date'.

page_sort.description: The order of sorting (ascending or descending, 'asc' or 'desc'). Defaults to 'asc'.

name: sponge_bob

name: search_social_links

page.description: The page number of the results to retrieve. Defaults to 1.

agentname.description: The name of the agent to search for. Defaults to None.

lang.description: The language spoken by the agent. Defaults to None.

photo.description: Whether to only show agents with a photo. 1 for yes, 0 for no. Defaults to None.

rating.description: The rating of the agent, between 1 and 5. Defaults to None.

name: view_item
description: Fetches an image and description of a catalog item based on provided credentials and identifiers.

creds_uuid.description: GUID representing the unique user identifier.

creds_checksum.description: Checksum of the credentials for validation.

socket_id.description: Socket in which the item is located.

catalog_item_id.description: Identifier of the catalog item to fetch details for.

format.description: Format of the request, can be either 'rest' or 'restx'.

description: Retrieves player details based on the provided username and region.

with_images.description: If set to True, includes URLs of related images in the response. Defaults to None.

rank.description: Order in which to rank countries. Can take two values:

name: getdirectdebitinitiationinstruction
description: Retrieve a direct debit initiation instruction by UETR ID.

name: map
description: Fetches a map image in WMTS format based on the given parameters.

tilerow.description: The WMTS tile row number (latitude direction).

tilematrix.description: The tile matrix, specified in the format `[EPSG code]:[Scale value]`.

tilecol.description: The WMTS tile column number (longitude direction).

rotationangle.description: Angle to rotate the map image. Valid range is 0 to 359, default is 0.

mapstyle.description: Design of the map. Format is `[design]_[annotation size]`, default is `std_pc`.

landmarkicon.description: Display of landmark icons. `on` for display, `off` for hide, default is `off`.

resolution.description: Resolution of the map image. Values can be `1`, `2`, or `4`, default is `1`.

contour.description: Display of contour lines. `on` for display, `off` for hide, default is `on`.

bldgname.description: Display of building names. `on` for display, `off` for hide, default is `off`.

logo.description: Display of brand logos. `on` for display, `off` for hide, default is `off`.

target.description: Display contents of the map. Values can be `1` for background only, `2` for annotations only, `3` for both, default is `3`.

format.description: Output image format. Values can be `image/png` or `image/jpeg`, default is `image/png`.

description: Queries the boundary of a postal code based on the given geographic coordinates.

longitude.description: The longitudinal coordinate of the location.

latitude.description: The latitudinal coordinate of the location.

offset.description: The number of records to skip in the results. Default is 0.

region.description: The region to filter the episodes by (e.g., 'US', 'FR'). Default is 'US'.

limit.description: The number of records to return per request, with a maximum of 100. Default is 25.

sort.description: The order to sort the records by. Use 'regular' for default order or 'reverse' for most recent episodes first. Default is 'regular'.

season.description: The specific season for which to retrieve episodes. If not specified, episodes from all seasons will be retrieved. Default is 1.

maximum.description: Maximum number of data points to retrieve.

outputsize.description: The size of the data to be returned, with a default of 30.

fill_text.description: Text used to replace any words matching the profanity list. Accepts letters, numbers, underscores (_), tildes (~), exclamation points (!), dashes/hyphens (-), equal signs (=), pipes (|), single quotes ('), double quotes ("), asterisks (*), curly brackets ({ }), square brackets ([ ]), and parentheses (). Maximum length of 20 characters. Defaults to None.
