name: get_mp3
description: Converts a YouTube video to an MP3 file, with optional cutting based on start and end times.

is_id.description: The unique identifier for the YouTube video.

cut.description: If provided, will cut the MP3 file based on the sstart and send parameters. Defaults to None.

sstart.description: The starting point for cutting the MP3. The format must be HH:MM:SS. Defaults to None.

send.description: The ending point for cutting the MP3. The format must be HH:MM:SS. Defaults to None.

name: leaguelogoimage
description: Fetch the logo image for a specific Rugby league in PNG format using the given tournament ID and RapidAPI key.

tournamentid.description: The unique tournament ID for which to retrieve the league logo image.

name: section_list
description: Returns a list of sections from the RapidAPI sports score service.

page.description: Page number to retrieve. Defaults to 1.

name: autocomplete_cities
description: Fetches autocomplete suggestions for USA cities from the RapidAPI service.

city.description: The name or partial name of the city to autocomplete.

name: random_crypto
description: Generates a list of fake cryptocurrency assets using the Random Crypto API.

size.description: Number of fake cryptocurrency assets to generate. Default is 5.

name: web_exchange_details
description: Fetches detailed information about a specific exchange on a given blockchain using the RapidAPI Open DeFi endpoint.

exchange_slug.description: The slug representing the exchange, e.g., 'sushiswap'.

chain_slug.description: The slug representing the blockchain, e.g., 'ethereum'.

name: get_latest_quote
description: Fetch the latest real-time quote for a given trading symbol.

tradingsymbol.description: The trading symbol for which to fetch the latest quote. Check the list of all supported trading symbols at [https://stockseyes.com/group/all](https://stockseyes.com/group/all).

name: get_all_restaurant_locations
description: Fetches a list of restaurant locations from the RapidAPI service.

page.description: The page number to retrieve data from.

name: bullish_harami
description: Fetches a list of stocks exhibiting the Bullish Harami candlestick pattern from the API.

page.description: The page number of results to retrieve. Default is 1.

name: getpowerplantbyradiusandgps
description: Fetches information about power plants within a specified radius from given GPS coordinates.

latitude.description: The latitude coordinate to search around.

longitude.description: The longitude coordinate to search around.

page_number.description: The page number for paginated results. Defaults to None.

radius_km.description: The radius in kilometers to search within. Defaults to 100 km if not provided.

name: channel_channels
description: Fetches data from the YouTube channel's collections or subscriptions using the RapidAPI service.

is_id.description: Channel ID to query. Default is 'UC-lHJZR3Gqxm24_Vd_AJ5Yw'.

gl.description: Geolocation code to filter the results by region. Default is 'US'.

cursor.description: Pagination token for results. Default is None.

hl.description: Language code for the results. Default is 'en'.

filter.description: Filter key for the type of collections. Options are 'all_collections', 'subscriptions', or a custom collection token. Default is None.

name: searchplayer
description: Searches for player data using the Toolbench RapidAPI service.

player_input.description: The name or keyword to search for a player. Defaults to None.

name: get_cigar_average_length
description: Fetches the average length of cigars based on specified filters.

wrapper.description: The wrapper type of the cigar. Default is 'Connecticut Shade, Ecuador'.

name.description: The name of the cigar. Default is 'Torpedo'.

filler.description: The filler type of the cigar. Default is 'Nicaragua'.

country.description: The country where the cigar is made. Default is 'Nicaragua'.

color.description: The color of the cigar. Default is 'Colorado Claro'.

strength.description: The strength of the cigar. Default is 'Mild-Medium'.

brandid.description: The brand ID of the cigar. Default is 13711.

name: get_country_by_fifa_code
description: Gets information about a country using its FIFA assigned country code from the Geography API.

fields.description: A comma-separated list of fields to filter the response. Defaults to None.

name: world_coordinate_to_income
description: Fetches per capita income data for a given set of geographic coordinates (longitude and latitude) using the provided API key.

lon.description: Longitude of the geographic coordinate.

lat.description: Latitude of the geographic coordinate.

name: getproductbyid
description: Fetches specific product details by product ID from the RapidAPI endpoint.

is_id.description: The ID of the product to fetch.

name: get_country_population
description: Fetch the population data for a given country using the Toolbench RapidAPI service.

country.description: The name of the country for which to fetch the population data.

name: consumers_get_reviews
description: Retrieve reviews for a specific consumer from the Trustpilot API.

is_id.description: The ID of the consumer whose reviews are to be fetched.

includereportedreviews.description: Specifies whether or not to include reported reviews. Defaults to None.

perpage.description: The number of items to include per page for pagination purposes. Defaults to 1.

page.description: The number of items to include per page for pagination purposes. Defaults to 1.

name: get_news_from_a_specific_source
description: Fetch news on pollution in African countries from a specified news source.

newspaperid.description: The identifier of the news source to fetch pollution news from.

name: get_scrabble_score
description: Fetches the Scrabble score for a given word using the Dicolink API.

mot.description: The word for which the Scrabble score is to be retrieved.

name: get_details_of_a_news_item
description: Fetches the details of a news item including the title, image, body, and other properties from the specified API using the provided parameters.

is_id.description: The unique identifier of the news item.

title.description: The title of the news item.

date.description: The publication date of the news item.

name: entertainment
description: Fetches entertainment news from Google News using the provided language region.

lr.description: Language region code in the format 'en-US'.

name: application_details_by_id
description: Retrieves application details from the RapidAPI by application ID.

is_id.description: The application ID to fetch details for.

country.description: The country code to filter results. Defaults to 'us'.

lang.description: The language code to filter results. Defaults to 'en'.

name: v1_weather
description: Fetches weather information from the API Ninjas Weather API endpoint.

country.description: The country name.

lon.description: The longitude of the desired location. Must be supplied with the `lat` parameter.

state.description: The US state (United States only).

city.description: The city name. Defaults to 'Seattle'.

lat.description: The latitude of the desired location. Must be supplied with the `lon` parameter.

name: get_artist_albums
description: Fetches and returns information about an artist's albums from the YouTube Music API.

channel_id.description: The unique identifier for the artist's channel.

params.description: Parameters required to fetch artist details, typically obtained from the `get_artist` function.

name: fetch_track_details
description: Fetches the details of a specific track using the provided track ID from the latest Spotify downloader API.

track_id.description: The unique identifier of the track to fetch details for.

name: fertility_window_get
description: Calculates the fertility window based on the first day of the last menstrual period and the cycle length by making a GET request to the pregnancy calculator API.

menstrual_date.description: The date of the first day of the last menstrual period in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

cycle_length.description: The length of the menstrual cycle in days.

name: metric_kilograms
description: Calculates the BMI (Body Mass Index) of an individual using metric measurements.

weight.description: The weight of an individual in kilograms (kg).

height.description: The height of an individual in meters (m).

name: get_city_by_id
description: Fetch details of a city by its ID using the RapidAPI Geography API.

is_id.description: The ID of the city to be fetched.

name: simple_qr_code
description: Generates a simple QR code for the given link with optional color customization using the RapidAPI Toolbench service.

link.description: The URL that the QR code will direct to.

color.description: The color of the QR code in hexadecimal format. Default is None, which results in the default color (#000).

name: list_transactions
description: Retrieve a pageable list of transactions for a specified time period from a project.

is_from.description: The start date of the period to retrieve transactions for, in Unix timestamp format.

to.description: The end date of the period to retrieve transactions for, in Unix timestamp format.

projectid.description: The ID of the project to retrieve transactions from.

pagesize.description: The number of transactions to retrieve per page. Maximum value is 500.

page.description: The page number to retrieve.

name: list_movies
description: List and search through all the available movies with various sorting, filtering, and ordering options.

genre.description: Used to filter by a given genre (default is 'all'). See http://www.imdb.com/genre/ for a full list.

order_by.description: Orders the results by either 'asc' (Ascending) or 'desc' (Descending) order (default is 'desc').

with_rt_ratings.description: If True, includes Rotten Tomatoes ratings in the results (default is None).

sort_by.description: Sorts the results by the specified value, such as 'date_added' (default is 'date_added').

page.description: The page number to retrieve, useful for pagination (default is 1).

query_term.description: Used for movie search, matching on: Movie Title, IMDB Code, Actor Name/IMDb, or Director Name/IMDb Code (default is '0').

quality.description: Used to filter by a given quality, such as '720p', '1080p', etc. (default is 'all').

minimum_rating.description: Filters movies by a given minimum IMDb rating (default is 0).

limit.description: The limit of results per page (default is 20).

name: images_search
description: Searches for images using the Bing Search API, based on the provided keyword and optional parameters for size and page number.

keyword.description: The search term to find related images.

size.description: The size of the images to be retrieved. Default is '30'.

page.description: The page number of the search results to retrieve. Default is '0'.

name: stock_symbols
description: Fetches and returns a list of all available stock symbols from the real-time-quotes API.

includenames.description: If True, includes stock names in the returned data. Defaults to None.

name: web_exchanges
description: Retrieve and sort exchanges based on specified criteria.

sort.description: The sorting criteria for the output. Defaults to 'usd_volume_30d', which sorts the exchanges based on their monthly volume.

direction.description: The sort order. Can be 'asc' for ascending or 'desc' for descending. Defaults to 'desc'.

filter_zero_volume.description: If set to True, excludes exchanges with no volume in the last 30 days. Defaults to None.

chain_slug.description: The blockchain slug (e.g., 'ethereum' for Ethereum mainnet). If provided, the function lists exchanges only for this chain. Defaults to None.

name: get_economic_calendar_news_over_a_period_of_time
description: Fetches economic calendar news within a specified time period.

content_type.description: The content type for the response. Default is 'application/json'.

time_start.description: The start date and time for the news fetch period in ISO 8601 format. Default is '2022-12-20 17:34:58+00:00'.

time_finish.description: The end date and time for the news fetch period in ISO 8601 format. Default is '2023-02-13 19:34:58+00:00'.

name: generate_pdf
description: Generates a PDF by capturing a screenshot of the provided website URL with specified dimensions using the Web Capture API.

width.description: The width of the screenshot in pixels. Defaults to 1024.

height.description: The height of the screenshot in pixels. Defaults to 780.

url.description: The URL of the website to capture. Defaults to 'https://google.com'.

name: get_movie_images_by_id
description: Fetches a complete list of images associated with a given movie ID from the Cinema API.

is_id.description: The movie ID for which to retrieve images.

name: songs
description: Fetches a list of songs from JSR/JSRF using the specified parameters.

limit.description: The maximum number of items to return in the response. Default is '5'.

sortby.description: The field by which to sort the results. Possible values include fields on the document, e.g., 'name', 'stats'. Default is 'name'.

orderby.description: The order in which to sort the results. Possible values are 'asc' for ascending and 'desc' for descending. The `sortby` parameter must be present for this to take effect. Default is 'asc'.

name: getspecialcompetitionview
description: Fetches the special competition view data from the RapidAPI service.

referer.description: The referer URL to include in the request headers. Default is 'https://www.mozzartbet.com.co/es'.

host.description: The host to include in the request headers. Default is 'www.mozzartbet.com.co'.

name: tennis_match_statistics
description: Fetches and returns statistics about a given tennis match identified by `match_id`.

match_id.description: The unique identifier for the tennis match.

name: leagueseasoninfo
description: Fetches the season information of a specific Football league from the provided API.

tournamentid.description: The unique ID of the tournament to retrieve the season information from.

seasonid.description: The unique ID of the season to retrieve the season information from.

name: get_long_url
description: Retrieve the long URL from a shortened URL using the Uptosite Link Shortener API.

slug.description: The unique identifier for the shortened URL.

name: hijos
description: Retrieves the list of children (hijos) from the Colegio Santa Ana API.

authorization.description: The authorization token required for accessing the API.

name: get_ico_calendar
description: Fetches the ICO (Initial Coin Offering) calendar based on the given parameters.

category.description: Comma-separated list of categories to filter the ICOs. For example: "_ico_cat_gaming,_ico_cat_ecomm,_ico_cat_finance,_ico_cat_healthcare".

time_utc_offset.description: UTC offset in seconds. For instance, UTC+8 is represented as 8 * 60 * 60 = 28800.

tabname.description: The status of the ICOs to retrieve. Options are 'upcoming', 'completed', or 'ongoing'. Default is 'ongoing'.

sort.description: The sorting criterion. Options are 'related_days', 'name', 'funds_raised', or 'completed'. Default is 'related_days'.

lang_id.description: Language ID for the response. Default is 1.

name: search_a_place
description: Search for a place using the Busy and Popular Times API, similar to how a location is searched on Google, returning the popular times graph if available.

query.description: The search term for the location.

name: media_info
description: Retrieves information about a media item from the Instagram API.

media_id.description: The ID of the media item to retrieve information for, used as a query parameter.

mediaid.description: The ID of the media item to retrieve information for, included in the URL path.

name: sentiment
description: Analyzes the sentiment of the given text using the VADER sentiment analysis tool through the RapidAPI platform.

text.description: The input text whose sentiment needs to be analyzed.

name: get_host_list_version_hosts_get
description: Fetch a list of hosts that ran an EcoIndex analysis, ordered by the number of requests made.

version.description: Engine version used to run the analysis (v0 or v1).

q.description: Filter for partial host name. Defaults to None.

date_from.description: Start date for filtering elements (format: YYYY-MM-DD). Defaults to None.

size.description: Number of elements per page. Defaults to 50.

date_to.description: End date for filtering elements (format: YYYY-MM-DD). Defaults to None.

page.description: Page number to retrieve. Defaults to 1.

name: market_data
description: Retrieves a list of daily stock metrics for a given ticker symbol, such as opening, closing, highest, and lowest prices.

ticker.description: The stock ticker symbol for which to retrieve market data.

name: protocols
description: Fetches protocol information from the "All-in-One Crypto Swiss Knife" RapidAPI service, optionally filtering by a search query and chain identifier.

q.description: Search parameter to filter the protocols. Defaults to None.

chain_id.description: Chain identifier to filter the protocols. Supported chains: "eth", "bsc", "matic", "avax", "okt", "hmy", "heco", "klay", "op", "arb", "ftm", "xdai", "cro", "mobm", "celo", "aurora", "fuse", "evmos", "cfx", "kava". Defaults to 'fuse'.

name: get_asn_by_country
description: Retrieves all Autonomous System Numbers (ASNs) associated with a given country.

country_code.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code (e.g., 'US', 'GB') to retrieve all ASNs for.

name: usuarios
description: Fetches user data from the RapidAPI Pizza Allapala service.

is_id.description: The user ID to fetch data for. Defaults to None.

name: appetizer_ingredient
description: Fetches a random appetizer recipe containing the specified ingredient using the Recipe Finder API.

ingredient.description: The main ingredient to include in the appetizer recipe.

name: category_tags
description: Fetch a list of tags for a given category ID using the toolbench_rapidapi key.

is_id.description: The category ID to fetch tags for.

name: nhl_score_board
description: Fetches the NHL scoreboard data for the specified date using the NHL API.

day.description: The day of the desired scoreboard data.

year.description: The year of the desired scoreboard data.

month.description: The month of the desired scoreboard data.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to return. Defaults to '5'.

name: list_of_games
description: Fetches a list of games that contain the given title or match the specified Steam App ID. The response includes the cheapest current deal for each game.

title.description: The title of the game to search for. Defaults to 'batman'.

exact.description: Flag to allow only exact string matches for the `title` parameter. Defaults to 0.

limit.description: The maximum number of games to return, up to 60. Defaults to 60.

steamappid.description: The Steam App ID of the game to search for. Defaults to None.

name: get_all_videos
description: Fetches all videos associated with a specific user on Likee using the provided user ID and optional pagination parameters.

uid.description: The unique identifier of the user whose videos are to be fetched. Can be found using the Get User Info endpoint.

pagesize.description: The number of videos per page. Defaults to '10'.

count.description: The total number of videos to be fetched. Defaults to '4'.

page.description: The page number to retrieve. Defaults to '1'.

name: schedules_list
description: Fetches a list of scheduled matches based on the provided type and optional pagination information.

type.description: Type of schedule to fetch. One of the following: 'international', 'league', 'domestic', 'women'.

lasttime.description: For paging purposes. Leave empty to load the first page, or provide an Epoch timestamp value in milliseconds (e.g., 1640883600000) to load the next page.

name: stagesubstages
description: Retrieve all substages of a specific Motorsport stage using the RapidAPI.

stageid.description: The ID of the Motorsport stage for which to retrieve all substages.

name: pressure_from_to_number
description: This function converts a given pressure value from one unit to another using the RapidAPI Unit Conversion service.

is_from.description: The unit of the pressure value to be converted from.

number.description: The pressure value to be converted.

to.description: The unit of the pressure value to be converted to.

name: canvas_titles_get_recommend
description: Retrieves similar comic recommendations from the Webtoon API.

titleno.description: The value of the `titleNo` field returned from the `/canvas/titles/list`, `/canvas/search`, or `/canvas/home` endpoint.

language.description: The language code for the response. One of the following: 'en', 'zh-hant', 'de', 'fr', 'es', 'th', 'id'. Defaults to 'en'.

name: find_zip_codes_by_city_and_district
description: Fetch the zip codes for a specified city and district in Poland.

city.description: The name of the city to search for zip codes.

district.description: The district within the specified city to search for zip codes.

x_traceid.description: A trace ID that is copied to the API response header. Default is 'optional_abc123'.

name: methane_endpoint
description: Fetches methane concentration data from the specified API endpoint using the RapidAPI service.

methane.description: Optional parameter to specify a particular methane concentration. Defaults to None.

name: get_train_schedule
description: Fetches the train schedule for a given train number using the IRCTC API.

trainno.description: The train number for which the schedule is to be fetched.

name: games_by_platform_category_sorted
description: Fetches and returns a list of games filtered by platform and category, and sorted based on a given parameter.

sort_by.description: Criterion to sort the games by. Defaults to 'release-date'.

platform.description: The platform to filter games by. Defaults to 'browser'.

category.description: The category to filter games by. Defaults to 'mmorpg'.

name: kompas_search
description: Performs a search on the Kompas news API using the provided parameters.

limit.description: The number of search results to retrieve.

page.description: The page number to retrieve in the paginated results.

name: stock_v3_get_profile
description: Fetches the company profile for a given stock using the performance ID.

performanceid.description: The unique identifier for the stock's performance, which can be obtained from endpoints such as `/auto-complete`, `/get-summary`, or `/get-movers`.

name: search_filters
description: Fetches the relevant job search filters and their estimated result counts based on the given query parameters. This is useful for refining search results or for analytics purposes.

query.description: Free-form jobs search query. It is highly recommended to include job title and location as part of the query.

language.description: Language of the results. Uses a 2-letter language code (e.g., 'en').

country.description: Country/region from which to make the query. Uses a 2-letter country code (e.g., 'us').

categories.description: Deprecated. Specifies job categories/industries as a comma-separated list of category values.

company_types.description: Specifies company types as a comma-separated list of company type values.

job_titles.description: Specifies job titles as a comma-separated list of job title values.

job_requirements.description: Specifies job requirements as a comma-separated list (e.g., 'under_3_years_experience', 'no_degree').

radius.description: Distance (in km) within which to return jobs, measured from the location specified in the query.

employers.description: Specifies employers as a comma-separated list of employer values.

remote_jobs_only.description: Whether to return only remote jobs (default is False).

employment_types.description: Specifies employment types as a comma-separated list (e.g., 'FULLTIME', 'PARTTIME').

date_posted.description: Specifies the posting date range for job results. Possible values include 'all', 'today', '3days', 'week', 'month'.

name: get_profile_recent_activity_time
description: Retrieves the time of the latest activity on a given LinkedIn profile using the Fresh LinkedIn Profile Data API.

linkedin_url.description: The URL of the LinkedIn profile to query.

name: items
description: Fetches item details from the Codester API using the specified item ID.

is_id.description: The item ID for which details are to be fetched.

name: check_wordpress
description: Checks whether the specified URL is running WordPress using the provided User-Agent and RapidAPI key.

user_agent.description: The User-Agent string to include in the request headers.

url.description: The URL of the website to check for WordPress.

name: autocomplete_places
description: Returns a list of places that match a given prefix and specified filter properties, useful for creating "search as you type" inputs.

limit.description: Maximum number of places to return. Used with `skip` to paginate results. Defaults to 10, maximum is 100.

skip.description: Number of places to ignore before beginning to return results. Used with `limit` to paginate results. Defaults to 0.

language.description: Specifies a language (ISO 639-1) for the localized name of the place. If unavailable, `localizedName` property will be null.

country.description: Filters places by their country ID. Multiple values can be specified, separated by commas (e.g., 'US,CA,MX'). Defaults to 'US,CA'.

admindivision1.description: Filters places by their adminDivision1 ID. Multiple values can be specified, separated by commas (e.g., 'US.CA,US.DE').

accuracyradiuskm.description: Maximum radius in kilometers from the specified coordinates (`latitude` and `longitude`) to filter places. Defaults to 100km.

latitude.description: Latitude to filter places by their location. Ignored if `longitude` is not specified.

admindivision2.description: Filters places by their adminDivision2 ID. Multiple values can be specified, separated by commas.

q.description: Query string to find places whose names start with this prefix. Defaults to 'Sea'.

longitude.description: Longitude to filter places by their location. Ignored if `latitude` is not specified.

type.description: Filters places by their type. Multiple values can be specified, separated by commas. Valid types are 'CITY', 'ADMIN_DIVISION_1', 'ADMIN_DIVISION_2', and 'COUNTRY'. Defaults to 'CITY'.

name: charts_track
description: Fetch a list of popular songs from a specified chart using the Shazam API.

listid.description: The identifier for the chart list, as returned by the `/charts/list` endpoint. Defaults to `None`.

pagesize.description: The number of items to fetch per response, with a maximum of 20. Defaults to `20`.

startfrom.description: The starting index for paging through the results. Defaults to `0`.

locale.description: The language code for the results. Defaults to `'en-US'`.

name: get_referral_domains
description: Retrieves a list of referral domains for a given domain using the Toolbench RapidAPI.

domain.description: The domain to retrieve referral domains for.

name: age_calculator
description: Calculates age based on the provided date and optional timezone.

date.description: The date of birth in one of the following formats: YYYYMMDD, YYYY-MM-DD, MMDDYYYY, MM-DD-YYYY.

timezone.description: The timezone to be considered for age calculation. Default is 'US/Eastern'. Format example: 'US/Eastern', 'US/Pacific', 'Europe/London'.

name: fish_api_group
description: Groups available fish data based on the provided metadata property, value, and attribute using the Fish API.

meta_property.description: The metadata property to search for.

property_value.description: The value of the metadata property that will be matched.

meta_property_attribute.description: The attribute of the metadata property to be searched. Defaults to 'class'.

name: addresses
description: Fetches a list of addresses matching the search query using the RapidAPI AddressR service.

q.description: The search string used to query addresses.

name: get_feed_video_list_by_region
description: Fetches a list of feed videos from TikTok for a given region.

region.description: The region code for which to fetch the feed video list.

count.description: The number of videos to fetch, with a default of '10'. Maximum of 20 videos can be fetched.

name: stock_sec_filings
description: Fetch the SEC filings for a given stock symbol from the Yahoo Finance API.

symbol.description: The stock symbol for which to fetch SEC filings.

name: keyword_search_at_coordinate_point
description: Fetch search results for a given query at a specified geographic coordinate point using the RapidAPI Local Rank Tracker service.

lat.description: Latitude of the coordinate point.

lng.description: Longitude of the coordinate point.

query.description: The search query or keyword.

x_user_agent.description: Device type for the search. Default is None.

zoom.description: Google Maps zoom level, ranging from 0 to 18. Default is '13'.

name: lottery_results_by_date_id
description: Fetches lottery results for a given date id from the Thai lottery API.

dateid.description: The date identifier for which to fetch lottery results.

name: app_reviews
description: Fetches app reviews from a specified app store using various filters.

app_id.description: The app ID for which to get reviews.

device.description: Only return reviews made on a specific device type. Allowed values are `PHONE`, `TABLET`, `CHROMEBOOK`. Default is `PHONE`.

region.description: The country code to use, specified as a 2-letter code (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2). Default is `us`.

sort_by.description: How to sort the reviews in the results. Allowed values are `MOST_RELEVANT`, `NEWEST`, `RATING`. Default is `MOST_RELEVANT`.

rating.description: Only return reviews with a certain star rating. Allowed values are `ANY`, `ONE_STAR`, `TWO_STARS`, `THREE_STARS`, `FOUR_STARS`, `FIVE_STARS`. Default is `ANY`.

limit.description: Maximum number of reviews in the results. Default is 10.

cursor.description: Specify a cursor from the previous request to get the next set of results.

language.description: The language to use, specified as a 2-letter language code (ISO 639-1 alpha-2). Default is `en`.

name: sha_text_hash
description: Hashes the input text using a specified SHA algorithm and returns the resulting hash.

datastring.description: The input text to be hashed.

mode.description: The SHA algorithm to use. Valid values are 1, 256, 384, or 512.

name: get_info_from_vin
description: Retrieves vehicle information from a VIN (Vehicle Identification Number) using the RapidAPI service.

vin.description: The Vehicle Identification Number to decode.

name: trainers_win_rate
description: Fetches trainers' win rate statistics from the past specified number of days.

last_days.description: The number of past days to consider for the statistics. Defaults to 7 days if not specified.

name: getpeoplebytopic
description: Fetches Azure influencers by topic from the specified page using the RapidAPI key.

topic.description: The topic to search for Azure influencers.

page.description: The page number of search results to retrieve.

name: pair_strength
description: Fetches the combined strength of currency pairs for a given timeframe from the Currency Quake API.

timeframe.description: The timeframe for which to retrieve the currency pair strength (e.g., 'h1', 'h4', 'd1', 'w1').

name: user_feed
description: Fetches the Instagram feed for a user.

userid.description: The ID of the Instagram user whose feed is to be retrieved.

max_id.description: The ID used for pagination to fetch the next page of results. Defaults to '{}'.

name: market_get_compact
description: Fetch the most informative fields about indices, commodities, currencies, rates, and other market data.

is_id.description: A comma-separated string of market IDs returned from the `/market/auto-complete` endpoint.

name: retrieve_collection_pricing_chart
description: Retrieves pricing chart data for a specified collection from the Blur API.

spanms.description: The time span in milliseconds to retrieve the pricing data for. Default is '86400000' (24 hours).

collectionid.description: The ID of the NFT collection to retrieve data for. Default is '0xed5af388653567af2f388e6224dc7c4b3241c544'.

intervalms.description: The time interval in milliseconds for data points in the chart. Default is '300000' (5 minutes).

name: autocomplete_zipcodes_lite
description: Fetches autocomplete suggestions for USA zip codes using the provided RapidAPI key.

zipcode.description: The zip code for which to fetch autocomplete suggestions.

name: people_id
description: Fetches and returns information about a person from the TVmaze API using the given person ID and RapidAPI key.

is_id.description: The ID of the person to retrieve information for from the TVmaze API.

name: tsv2
description: Fetches values from a specified data subset within a dataset using the ODAM RapidAPI.

limit.description: Limits the number of lines in the output table. Defaults to 10. A value of 0 means no limit.

debug.description: Debug status. When set to a non-zero value, debug mode is enabled. Defaults to 0.

format.description: Output format. Defaults to 'tsv'.

name: get_5_day_historical_daily_prices
description: Fetches 5 days of historical daily stock prices including adjusted Open, High, Low, Close prices, daily volume, dividend, and split information for a given ticker symbol.

ticker.description: The stock ticker symbol for which to retrieve historical data.

name: get_greet
description: Generates a greeting message based on the provided name and cringe level, using the RapidAPI greet generator.

name.description: The name to be included in the greeting.

cringelevel.description: The level of cringiness for the greeting.

name: forex_intraday
description: Fetches intraday time series data (Date, Open, High, Low, Close, Volume) for a given currency pair.

interval.description: Time interval for the data points, e.g., `1` for 1-minute interval, `5` for 5-minute interval.

symbol.description: The symbol of the currency pair to query, e.g., `EUR/USD`, `EUR-USD`, or `EURUSD`.

to.description: The query end date and time in the format `YYYY-mm-dd HH:MM` or just `YYYY-mm-dd`.

is_from.description: The query start date and time in the format `YYYY-mm-dd HH:MM` or just `YYYY-mm-dd`.

name: check_movie_status
description: Check the status of a movie session using the provided VSID via the RapidAPI service.

vsid.description: The video session ID obtained from the Start Movie Session API call response.

name: get_taboo_words_from_word
description: Fetches a list of taboo words associated with the given word using a specified API.

word.description: The word for which to retrieve taboo words.

forbiddenwordlimit.description: The number of taboo words to return, defaults to 5 and has a maximum of 10.

name: get_transaction_v2
description: Fetches normalized transaction data from a specified blockchain using the provided transaction ID and API key.

blockchain.description: The name of the blockchain to query.

txid.description: The transaction ID for the desired transaction.

name: followers_by_username
description: Fetches the followers list for a given Instagram username using the RapidAPI service.

username.description: The Instagram username for which to fetch the followers.

nextmaxid.description: The ID to fetch the next page of results (used for pagination). Defaults to None.

corsenabled.description: A flag to enable CORS. Defaults to None.

name: fan_rating
description: Retrieve the fan rating for a given event using the event ID and an optional RapidAPI key.

event_id.description: The unique identifier for the event whose fan rating is to be retrieved.

name: get_weekly_popular_books_by_genre
description: Retrieve the most popular books from the past week based on a specified genre.

genre.description: The genre of books to retrieve.

number_results.description: The number of results to return. Defaults to 10.

name: fetch_business_data
description: Fetches business-related information associated with a given WhatsApp business account phone number using the Toolbench RapidAPI.

phone.description: The phone number of the WhatsApp business account for which data is being requested.

name: time
description: Retrieves the current time token from the PubNub Network.

name: weather_dataset
description: Fetches weather data from the Weather Dataset API using provided parameters.

data.description: The specific weather data to query from the API. Defaults to '1'.

name: list_of_markets
description: Fetches a list of markets based on the provided parameters. Initially, a snapshot call should be issued followed by delta calls to capture changes since the given `since` value. This function utilizes an API to return market data based on the various filters specified in the parameters.

sport_id.description: The ID of the sport for which markets data is requested.

league_ids.description: The ID of the league to filter the markets. Defaults to None.

event_type.description: The type of event, either 'prematch' or 'live'. Defaults to None.

event_ids.description: The ID of the event to filter the markets. Defaults to None.

is_have_odds.description: Indicates if only matches with open odds or future odds should be returned (True or False). Defaults to None.

since.description: The UTC timestamp since when to fetch changes. Calls return changes since the provided `since` value. Defaults to None.

name: commonports
description: Fetches registered service names and transport protocol port numbers based on given parameters using the Toolbench RapidAPI service.

port.description: The port number to query for (default is '53').

protocol.description: The transport protocol to query for (default is 'tcp').

service.description: The service name to query for (default is None).

name: timezone_for_location
description: Fetch the current time for a given location and area using the World Time API.

location.description: The specific location for which to fetch the time (e.g., "London").

area.description: The larger area or region that the location falls within (e.g., "Europe").

name: state
description: Fetch a list of sub-regions/states/provinces/departments of the world's countries based on specified filters.

limit.description: Maximum number of records to return. Default is 250.

iso_a2.description: Two-letter country code to filter results. Default is 'us'.

iso_3166_2.description: Subregion's ISO-3166-2 letter code to filter results.

fields.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in the result. Default is 'iso_a2'.

name.description: Partial name filter for states in the specified language. Default is 'tex'.

lang.description: ISO 639-1 language code for language selection. Overrides Accept-Language header. Default is 'en'.

name: address_reverse_geocoding
description: Reverse geocoding to obtain address information for given coordinates.

coord.description: Latitude and longitude coordinates in a comma-separated format.

datum.description: Geodetic system of the latitude and longitude coordinates.

coord_unit.description: Unit of the latitude and longitude coordinates.

name: top_artists_duo_group
description: Fetches the YEAR-END Top Artists - Duo/Group chart information for a given year.

year.description: The year for which to retrieve the chart information in the format 'YYYY'. Defaults to '2022' if not provided.

name: get_playlist
description: Fetches playlist details from the Spotify Data API using the provided playlist ID.

is_id.description: The ID of the playlist to fetch.

name: growth_estimate
description: Retrieves growth estimate data for a given stock ticker using the Toolbench RapidAPI.

ticker.description: The stock ticker symbol for which the growth estimate is requested.

name: get_album_metadata
description: Fetches full metadata details of a specified album using the Spotify Scraper API.

albumid.description: The unique ID of the album for which metadata is to be retrieved.

name: cards
description: This function draws multiple cards from a regular 52-card playing deck using the Card Draw Simulator API.

value.description: The value of the card(s) to draw (e.g., 'A', '2', '3', ... 'K'). Defaults to 'all'.

suit.description: The suit of the card(s) to draw (e.g., '', '', '', ''). Defaults to ''.

back.description: Indicates whether to draw the back of the card. Defaults to 'false'.

pulls.description: The number of cards to draw. Defaults to '10'.

name: veiculo_tipo_id_marca_id_modelo
description: Sends a GET request to the veiculos API to retrieve vehicle information based on the type, brand, and model provided.

id_marca.description: The ID of the vehicle's brand.

id_modelo.description: The ID of the vehicle's model.

veiculo_tipo.description: The type of the vehicle (e.g., car, bike).

name: sign
description: Fetch horoscope information for a given astrological sign using the Horoscope Astrology API.

s.description: The astrological sign to fetch information for. Valid options include 'aries', 'taurus', 'gemini', 'cancer', 'leo', 'virgo', 'libra', 'scorpio', 'sagittarius', 'capricorn', 'aquarius', and 'pisces'.

name: downalods_hotels
description: Downloads a list of hotels based on various filters and returns the response.

latitude_range_end.description: Endpoint of the latitude range; requires `latitude` to have a value.

active_vmer.description: Show hotels with vacation merchant rates.

state_code.description: Filter by the state code of the hotel.

longitude_range_end.description: Endpoint of the longitude range; requires `longitude` to have a value.

latitude.description: Filter by the latitude of the hotel.

longitude.description: Filter by the longitude of the hotel.

property_type_ids.description: Filter by property type IDs. See the Property Type Filter Guide for more details.

hotel_address.description: Filter by the address of the hotel.

resume_key.description: Resume results from the given ID.

language.description: Language code in the format of 'xx-XX'. For example, en-US, es-ES, fr-FR, pt-BR.

limit.description: Limits the number of results returned in the response.

country_code.description: Filter by the country code of the hotel.

changes_since.description: Filter hotels that have been updated on or after this date. Must be in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss{UTC_Offset}).

name: getmentions
description: Fetches Twitter mentions for a given query using the specified parameters.

query.description: The search query to find mentions for (e.g., brand name, competitor).

period.description: The time period for mentions, in days. Defaults to None.

page.description: The page number of results to retrieve. Defaults to 1.

name: gethardquestion
description: Fetches the number of hard questions solved by a specified user on LeetCode using the RapidAPI service.

username.description: The LeetCode username of the user whose hard question count is to be retrieved.

name: consulta_cep
description: Fetches information about a given CEP (Postal Code) using the RapidAPI service.

cep.description: The Brazilian postal code (CEP) to be queried.

name: engines
description: Fetches engine information from a car API based on various query parameters.

year.description: The year of the vehicle.

direction.description: The direction to sort the results by, either 'asc' or 'desc'. Defaults to 'asc'.

valves.description: The number of valves in the engine.

valve_timing.description: The valve timing of the engine.

fuel_type.description: The fuel type of the vehicle.

json.description: A JSON string for complex queries.

make_model_id.description: The ID of the make and model.

trim.description: The trim level of the vehicle.

cam_type.description: The cam type of the engine.

make_model_trim_id.description: The ID of the make, model, and trim.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to return.

drive_type.description: The drive type of the vehicle.

verbose.description: Include additional information such as make, model, and trim when 'yes'. Defaults to 'yes'.

cylinders.description: The number of cylinders in the engine.

page.description: The page number of the results.

sort.description: The field to sort the results by. Defaults to 'id'.

size.description: The size of the engine.

horsepower_hp.description: The horsepower of the engine in HP.

transmission.description: The type of transmission in the vehicle.

name: real_time_price
description: Retrieves the real-time price of the specified financial instrument.

symbol.description: The instrument symbol, which can be any equity, index, ETF, forex, or cryptocurrency (e.g., `AAPL`, `EUR/USD`, `ETH/BTC`).

format.description: The format of the response. Can be 'CSV' or 'JSON'. Default is 'JSON'.

outputsize.description: The number of data points to return. Default is 30.

name: articles_v2_list_trending
description: Fetches a list of trending articles from the Seeking Alpha API within a specified date range and limits the response size.

since.description: Unix timestamp to filter articles from this date onwards. Use together with 'until' parameter to specify a date range.

until.description: Unix timestamp to filter articles up to this date. Use together with 'since' parameter to specify a date range.

size.description: Number of items per response (max 40). Defaults to 20.

name: points_point_forecast
description: Fetches weather forecast data for a specific geographic point using the National Weather Service API.

name: by_city_name
description: Fetch weather data from the RapidWeather API by city name.

q.description: City name, state code, and country code divided by commas (e.g., "London,UK").

lang.description: Language code to get the output in a specific language.

name: gethomepage
description: Fetch limited radio station data to display on the homepage.

limit.description: The number of radio stations to retrieve. Default is 10.

name: leagues_v2_get_table
description: Fetches the league table data for a specified category and competition using the RapidAPI service.

ccd.description: The Ccd field value obtained from the .../leagues/v2/list endpoint.

category.description: The category of the sport. One of the following: 'soccer', 'cricket', 'basketball', 'tennis', 'hockey'.

scd.description: The Scd field value obtained from the .../leagues/v2/list endpoint.

name: feed_by_username
description: Fetches the current Instagram feed for a given username.

username.description: The Instagram username for which to fetch the feed.

raw.description: If set to True or '1', returns the raw, unprocessed data feed. Defaults to None.

name: ip_address_lookup
description: Retrieves geolocation data for a given IP address using the Toolbench RapidAPI service.

ip.description: The IP address to look up.

name: getfaqs
description: Fetch FAQs for a specified page from the Election 2020 Smartable API.

page.description: The identifier for the specific FAQ page to retrieve.

name: dinotest
description: Tests the specified endpoint using the provided RapidAPI key and returns the response.

num.description: The endpoint number to be tested.

name: public_holidays
description: Fetches the public holidays for a given year and country.

countrycode.description: The code of the country for which to fetch public holidays (e.g., 'US' for the United States).

year.description: The year for which to fetch public holidays.

name: count_of_days
description: Fetches the count of days in the current Hebrew year from a given date string or today's date.

datestring.description: The date for which the number of days in the current Hebrew year is to be determined.

name: search_by_url
description: Fetches data from a given Zillow URL using the RapidAPI key for authentication.

currentpage.description: The page number to retrieve. Defaults to 1.

url.description: The Zillow URL to fetch data from. Defaults to a predefined URL for Brownsville, TX rentals.

name: syntax_status_syntax_ticket_get
description: Fetch the result of a syntax check using a provided ticket from the IFC BIM Services API via RapidAPI.

ticket.description: The unique identifier for the syntax check result to be retrieved.

name: pursuit
description: Performs a search for files using specified query parameters on FilePursuit and returns the search results.

q.description: The search query.

filetype.description: The file extension to filter results by. Only one file extension is accepted per query.

type.description: The file extension to filter results by. Only one file extension is accepted per query.

sort.description: The sorting order of the results. Accepted values are 'sizeasc', 'sizedesc', 'dateasc', 'datedesc', 'fileasc', and 'filedesc'. By default, 'datedesc' is selected.

start.description: The starting count for pagination.

name: three_hourly
description: Fetches a three-hourly weather forecast for a given location up to 14 days, with optional historical data and various configurable parameters.

location.description: The location for which to fetch the weather forecast.

history.description: Whether to include 24 hours of past data. Defaults to None.

tz.description: Time zone in the response, specified using IANA time zone database names. Defaults to 'Europe/London'.

dataset.description: The variable set to use in the response. Defaults to 'full'.

tempunit.description: The temperature unit in the response (e.g., 'C' for Celsius). Defaults to 'C'.

alt.description: The altitude in meters. Defaults to 0.

periods.description: The number of time steps in the response, with a default of 8 and a maximum of 12. Defaults to 8.

windunit.description: The wind speed unit in the response (e.g., 'MS' for meters per second). Defaults to 'MS'.

name: get_food_by_id
description: Fetches food information from a remote API using a given food ID.

is_id.description: The unique identifier of the food item to retrieve information for.

name: team_roster
description: Fetches and returns the roster for a specified football team using the RapidAPI service.

team.description: The abbreviation of the football team (e.g., BUF, NE, MIA).

name: season_episodes
description: Fetch episodes for a given season from the Netflix RapidAPI.

ids.description: Season IDs (separated by commas) for which episodes are to be fetched.

lang.description: Language code for the episodes. Defaults to 'en'.

limit.description: The maximum number of episodes to return. Defaults to 25.

offset.description: The offset for pagination. Defaults to 0.

name: get_user_favorite_videos
description: Fetches a list of favorite videos for a given user from the TikTok video feature summary API.

cursor.description: Position in the list to start fetching the videos from. Defaults to '0'.

user_id.description: The user ID for which to fetch favorite videos. Defaults to '6741307595983946754'.

unique_id.description: The unique identifier for the user, can be either a username or handle (e.g., 'voyagel' or '@voyagel'). Defaults to 'voyagel'.

count.description: The number of favorite videos to fetch. Defaults to '10'.

name: v1_hashtag_posts_hashtag_id
description: Fetches videos associated with a specific hashtag ID using the provided API key.

hashtag_id.description: The ID of the hashtag to search for.

count.description: The number of videos to retrieve. Defaults to 10.

offset.description: The offset for pagination. Use the 'cursor' value from a previous response where 'hasMore' is 1 for the next set of results. Defaults to 0.

name: footballersbyclub
description: Fetches a list of footballers for a specified club using the Premier League Stats API.

club.description: The name of the football club to retrieve the list of footballers for.

name: leaguemedia
description: Fetches media content for a specified football tournament, including images and videos.

tournamentid.description: The ID of the tournament for which you want to retrieve media.

name: areas_id
description: Fetches area details from the Zeus API using a given area ID.

is_id.description: The unique identifier for the area to fetch details for.

name: get_specific_ayah_verse
description: Fetches a specific Ayah (verse) from a given chapter in the Quran, with details in JSON format.

chapterid.description: The chapter (Surah) number to fetch the verse from. Must be between 1 and 114.

verseid.description: The verse (Ayah) number to fetch within the specified chapter. Must be a valid verse number within the chapter.

name: searchcountries
description: Search for countries based on a keyword, with support for pagination and sorting.

keyword.description: The search keyword to find matching countries. The search is case insensitive.

page.description: The page number for pagination.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to return per page.

sortby.description: The sorting criteria in the format `field:order`, e.g., `name:desc`, `alpha-2:asc`. Use `asc` for ascending order and `desc` for descending order.

name: search_places
description: Fetches a list of places (either countries, cities, or administrative divisions) that match a query and can be filtered by various properties.

type.description: Filters places by `type`. Specifiable values are 'CITY', 'ADMIN_DIVISION_1', 'ADMIN_DIVISION_2', and 'COUNTRY'. Default is 'CITY'.

language.description: Specifies the language (ISO 639-1) to get the localized name of the place. If translation is unavailable, the "localizedName" property will be null.

skip.description: Number of places to ignore before beginning to return results. Used with `limit` to paginate results. Defaults to 0.

country.description: Filters places by their country `id`. Multiple values can be specified, separated by commas (e.g., 'US,CA'). Default is 'US,CA'.

limit.description: Maximum number of places to return. Used with `skip` to paginate results. Default is 10, maximum is 100.

admindivision1.description: Filters places by their adminDivision1 `id`. Multiple values can be specified, separated by commas (e.g., 'US.CA,US.DE').

admindivision2.description: Filters places by their adminDivision2 `id`. Multiple values can be specified, separated by commas.

accuracyradiuskm.description: Maximum radius (in kilometers) from the point specified by `latitude` and `longitude` to filter places located within the area. Default is 100 km.

latitude.description: Latitude coordinate to filter places by location. Ignored if `longitude` is not specified.

q.description: Query string to find places with a similar name. Default is 'New York'.

longitude.description: Longitude coordinate to filter places by location. Ignored if `latitude` is not specified.

name: generatequiz
description: Generates a quiz based on the specified topic using the Quizy API.

topic.description: The topic for which the quiz needs to be generated.

name: get_store_info
description: Retrieves information on any store in Shopify using the provided RapidAPI key.

page.description: The page number to retrieve, defaults to None. If provided, it loads the specified page with results. Max page is 100.

name: extract_sitemap_xml_as_json
description: Fetches and parses a sitemap.xml file from the given URL and returns its content in JSON format.

url.description: The URL of the sitemap.xml file to be fetched and parsed.

meta.description: If True, includes meta information for each URL in the sitemap. Defaults to None.

breadcrumbs.description: If True, includes breadcrumb information for each URL in the sitemap. Defaults to None.

categories.description: If True, includes category information for each URL in the sitemap. Defaults to None.

name: format_number
description: Formats a given phone number using the Phone Validator API and returns the standardized format of the phone number.

phone.description: The phone number to be formatted.

name: trending_feed_video_posts
description: Fetches the current trending video posts from a social media platform using the specified API.

limit.description: The number of records to return in the response. Defaults to None, which returns up to 20 records.

name: get_phone_image_ids_by_custom_id
description: Fetches up to 10 image IDs for a given phone using its custom ID.

phonecustomid.description: The custom ID of the phone for which image IDs are to be fetched.

name: get_private_keys
description: Fetches the private keys associated with a given firmware hash from the IoT VAS service using the provided RapidAPI key.

firmware_hash.description: SHA2 hash of the device firmware.

name: reverse_php
description: Performs reverse geocoding using the specified API, longitude, and latitude.

api.description: Your API key for accessing the Geokeo reverse geocoding service.

lng.description: The longitude coordinate for the reverse geocoding request.

lat.description: The latitude coordinate for the reverse geocoding request.

name: search_hashtag
description: Fetch Instagram hashtags related to a given keyword using the Toolbench RapidAPI.

keyword.description: The keyword to search for associated Instagram hashtags.

name: asset_markets_by_id
description: Retrieves asset markets information by given asset ID from the specified API.

is_id.description: The ID of the asset.

name: tokens_all
description: Fetches data about tokens and optionally filters the results based on provided parameters.

take.description: The number of fields to retrieve.

walletid.description: Identifier for a specific wallet to filter tokens by.

searchterms.description: Terms to search for within the token data.

chains.description: Specific blockchains to filter tokens by.

skip.description: The number of fields to skip before starting to take.

ids.description: Specific token IDs to retrieve data for.

name: get_quotes_by_specific_category
description: Fetch a collection of quotes from a specific category using the World of Quotes API. It supports pagination and allows customizing the number of quotes returned per page.

category.description: The category of quotes to fetch.

page.description: The page number for pagination. Defaults to 2.

limit.description: The maximum number of quotes to fetch per page. Defaults to 20.

name: teams_detail
description: Fetch detailed information about a specific team using its team ID.

teamid.description: The unique identifier of the team for which details are needed. This ID can be obtained from various endpoints like /teams/search, /matches/detail, etc.

name: player_heatmap
description: Fetches the heatmap data for a specific player in a given season and tournament.

player_id.description: The unique identifier for the player.

seasons_id.description: The identifier for the specific season.

unique_tournament_id.description: The identifier for the specific tournament.

name: select_race_based_on_id
description: Fetches the details of a specific race using its ID from the F1 race schedule API.

is_id.description: The ID of the race to fetch details for.

name: us_de
description: Fetches current or historical gas price data for Delaware.

date.description: A specific date for querying historical gas price data. If not provided, the current gas price data is returned.

name: businessplan
description: Generates a business plan for the given idea using the Business Starter API.

idea.description: The business idea for which the plan will be generated.

name: get_car_data
description: Fetch specifications, pictures, and average pricing of a car based on its model, year, and maker.

year.description: The year the car was manufactured.

name: list_playlist_videos
description: This function lists available videos of a given YouTube playlist. It supports pagination to retrieve multiple pages of results and ensures thumbnails are not blurred by age restrictions.

nexttoken.description: A string token for fetching the next page of data. If not specified, the first page of data is returned.

playlistid.description: The ID of the YouTube playlist. Defaults to 'PLeCdlPO-XhWFzEVynMsmosfdRsIZXhZi0'.

lang.description: The language code (ISO-639) for localized results. Defaults to 'en-US'. Unsupported codes will fallback to 'en-US'.

name: profile_igtv
description: Fetches the IGTV channel profile information for a given Instagram username using the RapidAPI Instagram Scraper.

username.description: The Instagram username to fetch the IGTV profile for. Default is 'kimkardashian'.

nextmaxid.description: The next max ID for pagination, if any. Default is None.

name: retrieving_a_collection
description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific collection on OpenSea, including real-time statistics such as floor price.

collection_slug.description: The unique identifier for the collection on OpenSea.

name: emailverifications
description: Verifies a list of email addresses using the Fast Email Verifier API.

emailsimple.description: Comma-separated list of email addresses to verify. Default is 'mbavazijoshua@gmail.com,apisolution@gmail.com'.

name: revise
description: Revise and correct the given text using a specified content type and API key.

content_type.description: The content type of the text to be processed.

text.description: The text to be revised and corrected.

name: get_quote_of_the_day
description: Fetches the quote of the day from the World of Quotes API. The quote can optionally be filtered by a specific author or category.

author.description: The author of the quote. Defaults to None.

category.description: The category of the quote, e.g., 'inspirational'. Defaults to 'inspirational'.

name: behence
description: Check the availability of a given username on Behance using the Toolbench RapidAPI service.

username.description: The username to check for availability on Behance.

name: video_subtitles
description: Fetches the available subtitles for a given YouTube video using the specified RapidAPI key.

video_id.description: The ID of the YouTube video for which subtitles are to be fetched.

name: detailed_cocktail_recipe_by_id
description: Fetches a detailed cocktail recipe by its ID from the Cocktail DB API.

is_id.description: The ID of the cocktail to fetch the recipe for.

name: lines_line
description: Fetches all poems from Poetry DB that contain a specific line or part of the line.

line.description: The line or part of a line to search for in the poems.

name: verify_an_email

terms.description: Narrows down the results to articles that contain all the provided keywords. The terms should consist of one to three words separated by a dash. Example value: `election-campaign`.

offset.description: Omits a number of articles from the result.

to.description: Narrows down the results to articles published before the provided date-time in UTC. The format should be `yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm`. Example value: `2022-09-18T15:30`. Date-times of the future do not affect the result.

name: properties_list
description: Fetches a list of properties for sale or rent with various filters and options.

locationname.description: Name of the location as returned by the auto-complete endpoint.

locationid.description: ID of the location as returned by the auto-complete endpoint. Should not be used with `zoiid`.

country.description: Country code, one of "it", "es", "pt". Defaults to "it".

childrenallowed.description: Specifies if children are allowed. Defaults to None.

floorheights.description: Floors, separated by commas. Options: "topFloor", "intermediateFloor", "groundFloor". Defaults to None.

hashousekeeper.description: Indicates if a housekeeper is available. Defaults to None.

couplesallowed.description: Specifies if couples are allowed. Defaults to None.

garden.description: Indicates if the property has a garden. Defaults to None.

privatetoilet.description: Indicates if the property has a private toilet. Defaults to None.

terrace.description: Indicates if the property has a terrace. Defaults to None.

swimmingpool.description: Indicates if the property has a swimming pool. Defaults to None.

privateowner.description: Indicates if the owner is private. Defaults to None.

elevator.description: Indicates if the property has an elevator. Defaults to None.

airconditioning.description: Indicates if the property has air conditioning. Defaults to None.

accessible.description: Specifies if the property is accessible. Defaults to None.

gaypartners.description: Specifies if gay partners are allowed. Defaults to None.

distance.description: Radius to look for properties within. Defaults to None.

ispoi.description: Indicates if the location is a point of interest (works only with `zoiid`). Defaults to None.

maxitems.description: Maximum number of items per response for paging purposes. Defaults to 40.

zoiid.description: Zone of interest ID as returned by auto-complete endpoint. Do not use with `locationid`. Defaults to None.

locale.description: Locale code, one of "en", "es", "it", "pt", "de", "fr", "ro", "ru", "pl", "sv", "fi", "nb", "nl". Defaults to "en".

sort.description: Sorting order, either "asc" or "desc". Defaults to "asc".

numpage.description: Page index for paging purposes. Defaults to 1.

shape.description: Shape information as a JSON object string from the `zois/detail` endpoint. Do not use with `locationid` or `zoiid`. Defaults to None.

propertytype.description: Type of property, one of "homes", "bedrooms", "newDevelopments", "offices", "premises", "garages", "lands", "storageRooms", "buildings". Defaults to None.

auction.description: Auction filter, either empty or one of "excludeAuctions", "onlyAuctions". Defaults to None.

bedtype.description: Type of bed, one of "none", "single", "double", "twoBeds". Defaults to None.

ownernotliving.description: Specifies if the owner does not live in the property. Defaults to None.

newgender.description: Gender of the new tenant, either "male" or "female". Defaults to None.

gallery.description: Indicates if the property has a gallery. Defaults to None.

storeroom.description: Indicates if the property has a storeroom. Defaults to None.

builtinwardrobes.description: Indicates if the property has built-in wardrobes. Defaults to None.

maxsize.description: Maximum area size. Defaults to None.

minsize.description: Minimum area size. Defaults to None.

garage.description: Indicates if the property has a garage. Defaults to None.

luxury.description: Indicates if the property is a luxury one. Defaults to None.

housemates.description: Number of housemates, separated by commas (e.g., "3,4"). Defaults to None.

sincedate.description: Date filter, one of "Y", "W", "M" (Last 48 hours, Last week, Last month). Defaults to None.

petspolicy.description: Pets policy, either "allowed" or "disallowed". Defaults to None.

showruledouts.description: Indicates if ruled out properties should be shown. Defaults to None.

smokingpolicy.description: Smoking policy, either "allowed" or "disallowed". Defaults to None.

name.description: Filter results by name. The value should be sent as comma-separated. For example, for 'Zabrat Airport', send 'Zabrat,Airport'. Default is 'Ishigaki,Airport'.

limit.description: Limit to n results. Default is 50.

elevationover.description: Filter airports with an MSL elevation, or highest point of the landing area in feet, over this value. Default is 50.

city.description: Filter results by city. The value should be sent as comma-separated. For example, for 'Zakynthos Island', send 'Zakynthos,Island'. Default is 'Ishigaki'.

sortbyorder.description: Specify the sorting order. Possible values are 'asc' and 'desc'. Default is 'desc'.

tz.description: Timezone expressed as a tz database name (IANA-compliant) or an empty string for Antarctica. Default is 'Asia/Tokyo'.

icao.description: Filter results by ICAO code. Default is 'ROIG'.

subd.description: Filter results by subdivision (e.g., state, province, region, etc.). The value should be sent as comma-separated. For example, for 'Newfoundland and Labrador', send 'Newfoundland,and,Labrador'. Default is 'Okinawa'.

iata.description: Filter results by IATA code. Default is 'ISG'.

description: Fetches the Chaikin A/D Oscillator (ADOSC) indicator data for a given financial instrument.
