symbol.description: Instrument symbol, which can be any equity, index, ETF, forex, or cryptocurrency (e.g., `AAPL`, `EUR/USD`, `ETH/BTC`).

slow_period.description: Length of the slow EMA period. Defaults to 26.

fast_period.description: Length of the fast EMA period. Defaults to 12.

format.description: Output format, can be either `CSV` or `JSON`. Defaults to `json`.

outputsize.description: Number of data points to return. Defaults to 30.

name: teams_get_squad
description: Retrieves the squad information for a specific team based on the given team ID.

teamid.description: The ID of the team. This value is typically obtained from the 'id' field returned in various API endpoints such as /teams/search, /matches/detail, /tournaments/get-featured-events, /tournaments/get-scheduled-events, or /tournaments/get-top-teams.

name: stock_v2_get_valuation
description: Fetches the valuation data for a given stock using its performance ID.

performanceid.description: The value of the performanceId field from endpoints like /auto-complete, /get-summary, or /get-movers. It specifies the stock for which to fetch the valuation data.

name: get_token_price_history_between_dates
description: Retrieves the price history of a token between two specified dates in USD.

startdate.description: The starting unix timestamp (in seconds) for the price history.

chainid.description: The specific network the desired token resides on.

address.description: The address of the desired token.

enddate.description: The ending unix timestamp (in seconds) for the price history.

name: shorts_sound_attribution
description: Fetches the Shorts original sound attribution listing from the YouTube API.

x_cachebypass.description: Cache bypass value, must be set to '1' if used.

lang.description: Language code for localized results, such as 'en', 'gb', 'hi', etc.

geo.description: ISO 3166-2 country code of the region, such as 'US' (default), 'UK', 'CA', 'IN', etc.

params.description: Attribution parameter available in the Shorts info endpoint; defaults to a specific encoded string.

token.description: Pagination token for retrieving additional results.

is_id.description: Shorts video ID to be provided if the params value is not available.

name: snap_to_road
description: Snaps a given geographical coordinate to the nearest road.

lat.description: Latitude of the geographical coordinate.

lon.description: Longitude of the geographical coordinate.

apikey.description: API key for authenticating with the MyMappi service.

name: getzip
description: Fetch town information based on a provided ZIP code (Postleitzahl) using the RapidAPI.

zip.description: The ZIP code for which to fetch town information.

name: validate_phonenumber
description: Validates a phone number using the WhatsApp Checker Pro API.

phone.description: The phone number to be validated.

name: real_time_hashtag_search
description: Searches for live hashtags on social media based on a given keyword.

keyword.description: The keyword to search for related hashtags.

name: alerts_and_jams
description: Fetch real-time alerts and traffic jams from Waze in a specified geographic rectangular area.

top_right.description: Latitude, longitude pair defining the top-right corner of the geographic area.

bottom_left.description: Latitude, longitude pair defining the bottom-left corner of the geographic area.

max_alerts.description: Maximum number of alerts to fetch. Defaults to 20. Set to 0 to avoid fetching alerts.

max_jams.description: Maximum number of traffic jams to fetch. Defaults to 20. Set to 0 to avoid fetching traffic jams.

name: between_checker
description: Checks if a given date is between two specified dates using the DateClock API.

to.description: The end date in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

date.description: The date to check in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

is_from.description: The start date in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

name: price_forecasts
description: Fetches an AI-generated price forecast for a given stock symbol over the next 3 months using the Toolbench RapidAPI.

symbol.description: The stock symbol for which the price forecast is to be generated.

name: distance
description: Calculates the geodesic and great circle distances between two geographic points specified by their latitude and longitude coordinates.

name: get_quotes_by_anime_title
description: Fetches quotes from a specified anime title using the Anime Quotes API.

title.description: The title of the anime for which to fetch quotes. Defaults to 'Fairy Tail'.

page.description: The page number for pagination. Defaults to '1'.

name: get_annonce
description: Fetches advertisement details from the FluxImmo API based on a unique identifier.

unique_id.description: The unique identifier of the advertisement to fetch.

name: evaluate
description: Evaluates a mathematical expression using the given variables and their values through the RapidAPI service.

variables.description: A comma-separated string listing the variables used in the expression.

values.description: A comma-separated string listing the values corresponding to the variables.

expression.description: The mathematical expression to be evaluated.

name: check_text
description: Submits text for analysis to determine if it was generated by a machine or a human using the AI Detection API.

term.description: The text to be analyzed. Do not include any special characters.
term.default: Text you think is generated by AI

name: organic_results
description: Fetches JSON data of organic search results from Google using the RapidAPI service.

query.description: Search query string.

device.description: Device type for the search results, e.g. 'desktop', 'mobile'. Defaults to 'desktop'.

hl.description: Language for the search results. Defaults to 'en'.

html.description: HTML content toggle. Defaults to None.

duration.description: Duration filter, e.g. 'd', 'w', 'm', 'y'. Defaults to None.

lr.description: Language restrict parameter. Defaults to None.

safe.description: Safe search filter. Defaults to None.

uule.description: Encoded location parameter. Defaults to None.

nfpr.description: No forced personalized results toggle. Defaults to '0'.

num.description: Number of search results to return. Defaults to '10'.

tbs.description: Search filter tools, e.g. 'qdr:h', 'li:1'. Defaults to None.

gl.description: Geolocation for the search results. Defaults to 'us'.

page.description: Page number of the search results. Defaults to '0'.

name: coins_get_historical_data
description: Fetch historical data for a specific cryptocurrency pair from a given date range.

lang_id.description: Language ID as returned by the get-meta-data endpoint. Default is 1.

time_utc_offset.description: Time offset from UTC in seconds. Default is 28800 (UTC+8).

interval.description: Interval of the data points. Allowed values are 'day', 'week', or 'month'. Default is 'day'.

name: aliexpress_item_detail_3
description: Fetch detailed information about a specific AliExpress item.

currency.description: Currency for displaying the product price. Only supported currencies are accepted.

region.description: Region for accurate shipping costs and promotions. Only supported regions are accepted.

locale.description: Locale for displaying titles and content in the desired language. Only supported locales are accepted.

name: series_get_points_table
description: Fetch the points table for a given series using the Cricbuzz API.

seriesid.description: The unique identifier of the cricket series for which the points table is to be fetched.

name: tangga_lagu
description: Fetches the top tracks from the specified music chart.

index.description: The starting index of the track list.

num.description: The number of tracks to retrieve.

lang.description: The language of the tracks.

country.description: The country of the music chart.

is_id.description: The unique identifier for the specific music chart.

name: get_product_details_all_countries
description: Fetches the details of a specific product from Amazon using its ASIN code, for a given language and country code.

asin.description: The Amazon Standard Identification Number (ASIN) of the product.

languagecode.description: The language code for the product details. Defaults to 'EN'.

countrycode.description: The country code for the Amazon site to query. Defaults to 'US'.

name: game_predictions
description: Fetch game predictions using specified parameters.

timezone.description: The timezone name.

competitors.description: The competitor ID, if applicable. Defaults to None.

name: trending_charts
description: Fetches the trending videos chart for a specified region on YouTube.

part.description: The part parameter specifies a comma-separated list of one or more video resource properties that the API response will include.

regioncode.description: ISO 3166-2 country code of the region (e.g., 'US' for United States, 'UK' for United Kingdom, 'CA' for Canada, 'IN' for India).

chart.description: The chart parameter specifies the chart to retrieve (e.g., 'mostPopular').

x_cachebypass.description: The cache bypass value; must be '1' to bypass cache. Defaults to None.

name: eomonth
description: Computes and returns the date of the last day of a given month based on a specified start date and the number of months to adjust.

months.description: The number of months before or after the start date. A positive value results in a future date, while a negative value results in a past date.

start_date.description: The start date in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD), with or without time information.

name: address_postal_code
description: Fetch address information based on the given postal code and additional parameters.

postal_code.description: Postal code string (minimum: 3 digits, maximum: 7 digits).

datum.description: Geodetic system of latitude and longitude (default: 'wgs84'). Possible values are 'wgs84' for World Geodetic System and 'tokyo' for Old Japan Geodetic System.

offset.description: Skips a given number of first data (minimum value: 0, maximum value: 2000, default: 0).

coord_unit.description: The unit of latitude and longitude in the output data. Possible values are 'degree' for decimal system of degrees (default) and 'millisec' for milliseconds.

limit.description: Limits the number of response data (minimum value: 1, maximum value: 100, default: 10).

name: macronutrient_distribution
description: Calculates the optimal distribution of macronutrients (carbohydrates, proteins, and fats) based on dietary preferences, body composition goals, and activity level.

dietary_preferences.description: Represents the individual's dietary choices or restrictions, such as 'vegetarian', 'vegan', 'pescatarian', or 'gluten-free'.

body_composition_goal.description: The body composition goal, which can be 'weight_loss', 'maintenance', or 'muscle_gain'.

activity_level.description: The activity level of the individual, which can be 'sedentary', 'moderately_active', or 'very_active'.

name: bsa
description: Calculates the Body Surface Area (BSA) based on weight and height using an external API.

weightinkilograms.description: The weight of the individual in kilograms.

heightincentrimetres.description: The height of the individual in centimeters.

name: team_schedule
description: Fetches the schedule of fixtures for a given soccer team across all tournaments it participates in.

teamid.description: The unique identifier of the soccer team.

name: athlete_trophy_stats
description: Retrieve the trophy statistics for a specified athlete in a specified competition.

athleteid.description: The unique identifier of the athlete.

competitionid.description: The unique identifier of the competition.

timezone.description: The timezone to be used for displaying results.

langid.description: The language id for the output.

name: mrna2aminoacid
description: Transforms an mRNA sequence into a sequence of Amino Acids using the RapidAPI service.

mrna.description: The mRNA sequence to be converted to an Amino Acid sequence.

name: top_paid_mac_apps
description: Retrieves a list of the top paid Mac apps from the App Store.

category.description: Category of the apps to retrieve. Default is '6016'.

country.description: Country code to filter the app results. Default is 'us'.

lang.description: Language code for the results. Default is 'en'.

num.description: Number of results to return. Default is 100. Maximum is 200.

name: youtube_emb_link
description: Fetches YouTube embed link information using the given URL and RapidAPI key.

url.description: The URL of the YouTube video to fetch information for. Defaults to 'https://www.youtube.com/embed/OA9zy0BLm9g'.

name: retrieving_events
description: Retrieve a list of events for assets tracked by OpenSea using the OpenSea Data Query API.

collection_slug.description: The slug of the collection to filter events by.

auction_type.description: The type of auction to filter events by.

asset_contract_address.description: The contract address of the asset. Defaults to '0x4372f4d950d30c6f12c7228ade77d6cc019404c9'.

token_id.description: The token ID of the asset. Defaults to 309.

occurred_after.description: Unix timestamp to filter events that occurred after this time.

cursor.description: Cursor for pagination.

account_address.description: The account address to filter events by.

occurred_before.description: Unix timestamp to filter events that occurred before this time. Defaults to 1644800000.

only_opensea.description: Whether to restrict results to OpenSea only events.

event_type.description: The type of event to filter by (e.g., 'transfer', 'successful').

name: feed_hot
description: Fetches hot feed data from the specified API.

kapi_proxy.description: Proxy for the kapi endpoint. Default is None.

country.description: Country code for the feed. Default is 'ma'.

count.description: Number of items to fetch. Default is '30'.

language.description: Language code for the feed. Default is 'en'.

pcursor.description: Cursor for pagination. Default is None.

name: athlete_large_image
description: Fetches the large image for a specific athlete in the PNG format.

athleteid.description: The ID of the athlete whose large image is to be fetched.

imageversion.description: The version of the image to be fetched.

name: gera_comprovante_rfb
description: Generates a certificate from Receita Federal in PDF format.

taxid.description: The tax identification number to be used for generating the certificate.

pages.description: A comma-separated string specifying which pages to include in the certificate. Default is 'REGISTRATION,MEMBERS'.

name: get_exchange_rate
description: Fetches the exchange rate between two currency codes using the RapidAPI service.

to.description: The target currency code for which you want to get the exchange rate.

is_from.description: The base currency code from which you are converting.

name: website_url_qr_code
description: Generates a static QR code (standard or custom-designed) encoded with the specified URL and customization options using the Scanova QR Code API.

error_correction.description: Specifies error correction level. Default is 'H'.

eye_pattern.description: Specifies the eye pattern of the QR code. Default is 'RECT_RECT'.

data_gradient_style.description: Specifies the gradient style for the data modules. Default is 'None'.

format.description: Specifies the format of the QR code image. Default is 'png'.

size.description: Specifies the size of the QR code image. Default is 'm'.

eye_color_outer.description: Specifies the outer color of the eye modules. Default is '#000000'.

data_gradient_end_color.description: Specifies the end color of the gradient for data modules. Default is '#000000'.

data_gradient_start_color.description: Specifies the start color of the gradient for data modules. Default is '#000000'.

eye_color_inner.description: Specifies the inner color of the eye modules. Default is '#000000'.

url.description: The URL to be encoded in the QR code. Default is 'https://scanova.io'.

data_pattern.description: Specifies the data pattern of the QR code. Default is 'RECT'.

background_color.description: Specifies the background color of the QR code. Default is '#FFFFFF'.

name: v1_aggregation
description: Aggregates news article counts based on specified search criteria and time intervals.

q.description: The search query string, which must be URL-encoded.

country.description: The country to narrow the search to, specified using ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 codes. This parameter is experimental and recommended to be used with the `lang` parameter.

topic.description: The topic to filter articles by. Accepted values include `news`, `sport`, `tech`, `world`, `finance`, `politics`, `business`, `economics`, `entertainment`, `beauty`, `travel`, `music`, `food`, `science`. This parameter is experimental.

sources.description: Comma-separated string of news sources to filter the search. Example: `nytimes.com,cnn.com`.

agg_by.description: Aggregation interval for the results. Accepts `day` (default) or `hour`.

to_rank.description: Upper boundary of the rank of news websites to filter the search.

media.description: When set to `True`, includes `media` and `media_content` fields in the output which provide information about images associated with the articles.

lang.description: The language to filter the search. Acceptable values include language codes like `en` for English, `es` for Spanish, etc.

not_sources.description: Comma-separated string of sources to exclude from the search. Example: `nytimes.com,cnn.com`.

to.description: The end date and time to search until, in UTC. Various date formats are accepted.

ranked_only.description: Limit the search to sources that are in the top 1 million online websites. Default is `True`.

is_from.description: The start date and time to search from, in UTC. Various date formats are accepted. The default is set to one week ago at midnight UTC.

search_in.description: Defines where to search the provided query (in `title`, `summary`, or both). Default is both.

from_rank.description: Lower boundary of the rank of news websites to filter the search. Lower rank indicates higher popularity.

name: locationsuggestions_v2
description: Fetches location suggestions from the Zillow API based on the given location query.

location.description: The location query which can be a state, county, neighborhood, city, street name, or zip code.

name: get_block_hash_v2
description: Gets the block hash by its height for a given blockchain using the Toolbench API.

blockheight.description: The height or index of the block for which the hash is to be retrieved.

blockchain.description: The name of the blockchain from which to retrieve the block hash.

name: gender_from_name
description: Infers the gender of a person given their name using the RapidAPI service.

name.description: The name of the person whose gender is to be inferred.

name: get_response
description: Generates an automatic custom response based on the type and brand of a business and a given review.

avis.description: The review text (e.g., "Merci pour votre accueil, c'tait parfait").

name: cashflow
description: Fetches either annual or quarterly cash flow statements for a given stock symbol.

symbol.description: The stock symbol of the company (e.g., 'AAPL' for Apple Inc.).

period.description: The reporting period for the cash flow statement. Typically 'annual' or 'quarterly'.

name: cities_v2_get_information
description: Fetches information about a specific city using its identifier.

is_id.description: The ID of the city as returned by the `/v2/auto-complete` endpoint.

x_units_temperature.description: Unit for temperature. One of 'fahrenheit' or 'celsius'. Defaults to 'celsius'.

x_aqi_index.description: AQI (Air Quality Index) standard. One of 'us' or 'cn'. Defaults to 'us'.

x_units_pressure.description: Unit for pressure. One of 'hg' or 'mbar'. Defaults to 'mbar'.

x_units_distance.description: Unit for distance. One of 'miles' or 'kilometer'. Defaults to 'kilometer'.

name: list_of_available_currencies
description: Retrieve the list of available currencies from the API, with optional filters for fixed-rate and active currencies.

fixedrate.description: Set to 'true' to return only currencies available on a fixed-rate flow. Defaults to 'true'.

active.description: Set to 'true' to return only active currencies. Defaults to 'true'.

name: get_event_logs_filtered_by_topic
description: Fetch event logs filtered by topics for a given blockchain network and address.

chainid.description: The ID of the blockchain network from which to fetch logs.

address.description: The address to fetch logs from.

topics.description: The topics to filter the logs by.

endblock.description: The block number to stop fetching logs. Defaults to None.

startblock.description: The block number to start fetching logs. Defaults to None.

name: equity_intraday
description: Retrieve intraday time series data (Date, Open, High, Low, Close, Volume) for a specific symbol based on given parameters.

interval.description: The time interval in minutes for the data points, such as `1` (1 min) or `5` (5 min).

to.description: The end date and time of the query in formats like **YYYY-mm-dd HH:MM** or **YYYY-mm-dd**.

is_from.description: The start date and time of the query in formats like **YYYY-mm-dd HH:MM** or **YYYY-mm-dd**.

symbol.description: The stock symbol for the queried asset, e.g., `AAPL` for Apple Inc or `MSFT` for Microsoft.

adjust.description: Indicates if the price data should be adjusted. Defaults to None.

name: search_in_area
description: Search for businesses in a specified geographic area defined by a central coordinate point and zoom level.

lat.description: Latitude of the center coordinate point of the search area.

zoom.description: Zoom level on which to conduct the search.

query.description: Search query or keyword (e.g., 'Bars and pubs', 'Plumbers').

lng.description: Longitude of the center coordinate point of the search area.

x_user_agent.description: Device type for the search. Defaults to 'desktop'.

region.description: Query region code. Defaults to 'us'.

language.description: Language code for the results. Defaults to 'en'.

subtypes.description: Comma-separated list of specific business subtypes (e.g., 'Plumber,Carpenter,Electrician').

fields.description: Comma-separated list of business fields to include in the response.

limit.description: Maximum number of businesses to return (1-500). Defaults to '20'.

name: getstatsbyday
description: Fetches Trinidad & Tobago COVID-19 statistics for a specific day using the given year, month, and day identifiers.

monthid.description: The month identifier in "MM" format (e.g., "01" for January).

dayid.description: The day identifier in "DD" format (e.g., "01" for the 1st day of the month).

name: get_1_3_list_non_working_days
description: Fetch the non-working days (weekend days, public holidays, and custom dates) between two specified dates for a given country.

start_date.description: The start date in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

end_date.description: The end date in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

country_code.description: The ISO country code (2 letters). See available countries & configurations.

configuration.description: The name of the preset configuration to be used. Defaults to 'Federal holidays'.

profile_id.description: Custom profile ID for the request. Defaults to None.

name: get_all_motivational_quotes
description: Fetch all motivational quotes with optional pagination support.

skip.description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set.

limit.description: The number of quotes to return.

name: get_user_id
description: Fetches the user ID for a given Twitch channel using the Twitch API.

channel.description: The Twitch channel name for which to fetch the user ID.

name: estimate_ownership_cost
description: Estimates the ownership cost for a vehicle over the next 5 years based on the vehicle's VIN, annual mileage, and starting mileage.

vin.description: The Vehicle Identification Number of the car to estimate ownership cost for.

mileage_year.description: The estimated number of miles driven per year for the next 5 years. Defaults to 15,000.

mileage_start.description: The starting mileage of the car. Defaults to 50,000 if unspecified.

name: verse_range_api
description: Fetches a specific passage range from the Bible in a given translation using the RapidAPI.

verse_end.description: The ending verse number of the passage.

chapter.description: The chapter number of the passage.

verse_start.description: The starting verse number of the passage.

book.description: The book of the Bible from which the passage is fetched (e.g., 'Genesis', 'John').

name: check_usernames_on_all_platforms
description: Checks if the given username is available on various platforms using the Toolbench RapidAPI.

username.description: The username to be checked for availability.

name: detik_search
description: Search for news articles on detik.com using specified parameters.

page.description: The page number of the results to retrieve.

limit.description: The number of results to return per page.

keyword.description: The keyword to search for in news articles.

name: person
description: Retrieve details about a specific person (e.g., actor, director) using their unique ID.

is_id.description: The unique identifier for the person whose details are being fetched.

name: estimate
description: Estimates the video view performance of a YouTube channel using the given channel type and channel name.

channelname.description: The username of the channel to look up for the performance estimation.

name: get_all
description: Retrieves a list of anime based on the specified search, sort, type, and genre criteria from the given API.

page.description: The page number to retrieve.

size.description: The number of items per page.

genres.description: Comma-separated list of genres. Defaults to 'Fantasy,Drama'.

sortby.description: The parameter to sort by, either 'ranking' or 'title'. Defaults to 'ranking'.

sortorder.description: The sort order, either 'asc' or 'desc'. Defaults to 'asc'.

search.description: The title or alternate title to search for. Search will ignore sorting. Defaults to 'Fullmetal'.

name: web_page_lookup
description: Fetches metadata about a web page, including Genius's ID for the page, which can be used to look up associated referents.

raw_annotatable_url.description: The full URL of the web page (including protocol).

og_url.description: The URL specified by an og:url <meta> tag in the page's <head>.

canonical_url.description: The URL specified by a canonical <link> tag in the page's <head>.

text_format.description: Format for text bodies related to the document. One or more of `dom`, `plain`, `markdown`, and `html`, separated by commas (defaults to html).

name: getmanufacturervalues
description: Returns a set of all manufacturer names filtered by the specified query parameters.

format.description: Specifies the output type. Allowed values are 'CSV', 'HTML', 'XML', 'JSON'.

collection.description: A label used to name a set of images collected for a specific trial or other reason. Assigned during the data curation process.

bodypartexamined.description: Standard DICOM definition (0018x0015) specifying the body part that was examined.

modality.description: Standard DICOM definition (0008x0060) specifying the imaging modality.

name: v1_sources
description: Fetches a list of supported news websites based on specified language, topic, and country.

lang.description: Specifies the language of the search. Supported values are:

topic.description: Specifies the topic to filter the articles. Supported values are:

country.description: Specifies the country to filter the articles. Accepts ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country codes.

name: get_distance_in_km
description: Calculates the great-circle distance between two geographic coordinates in kilometers.

name: latest_price
description: Fetches the latest price for the given item ID and timestep from the OSRS Live Prices API.

timestep.description: The timestep for which to retrieve the latest price.

itemid.description: The ID of the item for which to fetch the latest price.

name: south_africa_songs
description: Fetch the South Africa Songs chart information for a specific date range.

date.description: The date in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD' for which to retrieve the chart information.

range.description: The range of the chart positions to be retrieved.

name: download_airports
description: Downloads a list of airports with IATA codes for flight search from the Priceline API.

resume_key.description: An optional key to resume results from a given ID. Defaults to None.

limit.description: Limits the number of results from the response. Defaults to 500.

name: get_zip_info
description: Retrieve information about a given ZIP code using the Toolbench API.

zipcode.description: The ZIP code for which the information is to be retrieved.

name: get_addresses_by_postcode
description: Fetch a list of addresses or streets by specifying the postcodes.

cp4.description: The first part of the postcode.

cp3.description: The second part of the postcode.

name: rent_zestimate_and_comparable_properties
description: Returns a property's rent zestimate and its comparable properties in the same area.

address.description: The address of the property for which the rent zestimate is being requested.

bedrooms.description: Filter for number of bedrooms. Multiple values can be separated by commas (e.g., '0,1,2,3,4plus').

pets.description: Filter for pets. Possible values are 'any', 'dogs', 'cats'. Multiple values can be separated by commas.

amenities.description: Filter for amenities such as 'cooling', 'heating', 'parking'. Multiple values can be separated by commas.

laundry.description: Filter for laundry type. Possible values are 'any', 'inUnit', 'shared'. Multiple values can be separated by commas.

propertytypes.description: Filter for property types such as 'apartment', 'house', 'townhouse', 'condo'. Multiple values can be separated by commas.

activetypes.description: Filter for active rental types. Possible values are 'any', 'active', 'inactive'.

deactivateddays.description: Filter for inactive rentals within a specific number of days such as '30', '15', '7'.

activateddays.description: Filter for inactive rentals within a specific number of days such as '30', '15', '7'.

distanceinmiles.description: Filter for distance in miles. Possible values are 'any', '1', '2', '3', '4', '5'.

name: equity_daily
description: Fetch end-of-day (daily) time series data for a specified asset within a given date range.

is_from.description: The query start date in the format 'YYYY-mm-dd', e.g. '2018-04-01'.

name: post_likes
description: Gets the list of users who liked a specific Instagram post.

mediaid.description: The unique identifier of the Instagram media (post) to retrieve likers for.

name: equity_splits
description: Fetches the splits history data for a given security from the Quotient API.

symbol.description: The symbol of the asset to look for, e.g., `AAPL` (Apple Inc), `MSFT` (Microsoft Corporation).

is_from.description: The query start date (supported format is **YYYY-mm-dd**), e.g., `2019-01-01`.

to.description: The query end date (supported format is **YYYY-mm-dd**), e.g., `2020-04-17`.

name: publications
description: Fetches the publications for the specified Instagram user using the RapidAPI service.

nextmaxid.description: The maximum ID for the next page of results. Defaults to None.

username.description: The Instagram username to fetch publications for. Defaults to 'kimkardashian'.

name: countries_allcontries
description: Fetches information about a specific country in Africa from an API.

country_name.description: The name of the country for which to fetch details.

name: get_alerts
description: Retrieves alert data from the SEPTA API using specified parameters.

req1.description: A string representing the request parameter, defaults to 'all'.

name: api_v2_minimal_exchange_amount
description: Fetch the minimal payment amount required to perform a cryptocurrency exchange using the ChangeNow API v2.

flow.description: Type of exchange flow. Options are 'standard' or 'fixed-rate'. Default is 'standard'.

tocurrency.description: Ticker of the currency to receive.

fromcurrency.description: Ticker of the currency to exchange.

fromnetwork.description: Network of the currency to exchange.

tonetwork.description: Network of the currency to receive.

name: proxy_get
description: Fetches a list of proxies based on specified parameters.

type.description: The type of proxy to retrieve. Possible values are 'http', 'https', 'socks4', 'socks5'. Default is 'http'.

country.description: A two-letter country code to filter proxies by country. For more information about country codes, refer to https://www.nationsonline.org/oneworld/country_code_list.htm. Default is 'US'.

anonymity.description: The level of anonymity required. Possible values are 'high', 'anonymous', 'transparent'. Default is 'high'.

name: get_sun_rise_and_sun_set_time
description: Fetches the sunrise and sunset times for a given date and location, optionally considering a specific timezone.

date.description: The date for which to find sunrise and sunset times in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.

latitude.description: The latitude of the location.

longitude.description: The longitude of the location.

timezone.description: The timezone to consider for the sunrise and sunset times. Default is 'Asia/Calcutta'.

name: artists
description: Returns a list of music artists who contributed to JSR/JSRF.

limit.description: The maximum number of items to return. Default is '5'.

sortby.description: The field to sort the items by. Possible values include any field on the document (e.g., 'name', 'stats'). Default is 'name'.

orderby.description: The order to sort the items in. Possible values are 'asc' (ascending) and 'desc' (descending). Default is 'asc'.

name: bridges
description: Fetch data about cross-chain bridges using the Bridges API from DeFi Watch.

take.description: The number of bridges to retrieve.

skip.description: The number of bridges to skip from the start.

is_from.description: The name of the blockchain from which you want to send.

to.description: The name of the blockchain to which you want to send.

name: list_movies_json
description: Lists and searches through all available movies with various filters and sorting options. The function can return results with Rotten Tomatoes ratings and allows filtering by multiple criteria such as IMDb rating, genre, and quality, among others.

with_rt_ratings.description: If True, includes Rotten Tomatoes ratings in the results.

minimum_rating.description: An integer between 0 and 9 (inclusive) to filter movies by a given minimum IMDb rating.

limit.description: An integer between 1 and 50 (inclusive) to limit the number of results per page.

page.description: An unsigned integer to see the next page of movies. For example, limit=15 and page=2 will show movies 15-30.

query_term.description: A string used for movie search that matches on movie title, IMDb code, actor name, or director name.

order_by.description: A string ('desc' or 'asc') to order the results by either descending or ascending order.

genre.description: A string to filter movies by a given genre (see http://www.imdb.com/genre/ for the full list).

quality.description: A string ('720p', '1080p', '3D') to filter movies by a given quality.

sort_by.description: A string ('title', 'year', 'rating', 'peers', 'seeds', 'download_count', 'like_count', 'date_added') to sort the results by the chosen value.

name: localized_routes
description: Fetches localized routing data from the Betsport API.

referer.description: The referer URL to be included in the API request headers. Default is 'https://www.mozzartbet.com.co/es'.

host.description: The host to be included in the API request headers. Default is 'www.mozzartbet.com.co'.

name: get_music
description: Fetches music data from the TikTok API using the given music ID.

music_id.description: The identifier for the music track to fetch from TikTok.

name: getclimatescorebygps
description: Fetches the climate score for a given GPS position based on specific disaster and activity types.

latitude.description: The latitude coordinate of the location.

longitude.description: The longitude coordinate of the location.

name: gst
description: Verifies a GST (Goods and Services Tax) number using the GST Advance API.

gst.description: The GST number to be verified.

name: user_followings
description: Fetches the list of followings for a given TikTok user.

user_id.description: The unique ID of the TikTok user whose followings are to be fetched.

count.description: The number of followings to retrieve. Defaults to None.

cursor.description: The cursor for pagination. Use this to fetch the next set of followings. Defaults to None.

name: get_company_quote_price_data
description: Retrieve updated quote and pricing data for a specified company.

ticker.description: The ticker symbol of the company to retrieve data for.

name: get_appointments
description: Retrieves all appointments for a given date and clinic name from the API.

date.description: The date for which the appointments are requested in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

clinicname.description: The name of the clinic for which the appointments are requested.

name: basal_metabolic_rate_bmr
description: Calculates the Basal Metabolic Rate (BMR) based on gender, age, height, weight, and optionally the equation for the calculation.

height.description: The height in centimeters.

equation.description: The equation to use for the calculation. Valid options are 'mifflin' (default) and 'harris'.

name: get_all_games
description: Retrieves a list of basketball games based on the given filters using the free-nba API.

page.description: The page number for pagination. Defaults to '0'.

per_page.description: The number of results returned per call for pagination. Defaults to '25'.

team_ids.description: A comma-separated string of team IDs to filter the games.

date.description: A specific date to filter games, formatted as 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

seasons.description: A comma-separated string of seasons represented by the starting year (e.g., '2018' for the 2018-2019 season).

name: get_supported_file_type
description: Retrieves the supported file types for a given input file type using the All-In-One File Converter API.

input.description: The input file type for which to retrieve the supported file types.

name: volume_weighted_average_price_vwap
description: Returns the Volume Weighted Average Price (VWAP) indicator for a given financial instrument.

exchange.description: The exchange on which the symbol is traded.

symbol.description: The symbol for which the VWAP is to be calculated.

interval.description: The interval for the VWAP calculation (e.g., "1m", "5m", "1h").

market.description: The type of market. Available options are 'spot', 'usdt-perpetual', 'inverse-perpetual'.

backtracks.description: The number of periods to include in the calculation for historical data. Defaults to 1.

is_from.description: The starting timestamp for the data retrieval. Defaults to '1683895800'.

name: games
description: Returns a list of games from the Jet Set Radio API with optional parameters for limiting and sorting the results.

limit.description: Limit the number of items returned in the response. Defaults to '5'.

orderby.description: Order in which to sort the results. Possible values are 'asc' or 'desc'. The default value is 'asc'.

sortby.description: Field by which to sort the results. Possible values are any field on the document, such as 'name' or 'stats'. Defaults to 'name'.

name: coins_list
description: Fetches a list of available cryptocurrencies based on provided filters and sorting options.

edition_currency_id.description: The unique identifier for the edition currency, returned in the `/get-meta-data` endpoint.

total_volume_min.description: Minimum total volume for the cryptocurrency. Refer to `rangeFilters/total_volume/steps` for available values.

chg_24h_min.description: Minimum 24-hour change value for the cryptocurrency. Refer to `rangeFilters/chg_24h/steps` for available values.

lang_id.description: Language ID, with 1 being the default. Refer to `all_langs/lang_ID` in the `/get-meta-data` endpoint.

total_volume_max.description: Maximum total volume for the cryptocurrency. Refer to `rangeFilters/total_volume/steps` for available values.

chg_7d_max.description: Maximum 7-day change value for the cryptocurrency. Refer to `rangeFilters/chg_7d/steps` for available values.

time_utc_offset.description: Time offset in seconds from UTC. Default is 28800 (UTC+8).

chg_7d_min.description: Minimum 7-day change value for the cryptocurrency. Refer to `rangeFilters/chg_7d/steps` for available values.

market_cap_max.description: Maximum market capitalization for the cryptocurrency. Refer to `rangeFilters/market_cap/steps` for available values.

market_cap_min.description: Minimum market capitalization for the cryptocurrency. Refer to `rangeFilters/market_cap/steps` for available values.

chg_24h_max.description: Maximum 24-hour change value for the cryptocurrency. Refer to `rangeFilters/chg_24h/steps` for available values.

volume_24h_max.description: Maximum 24-hour trading volume for the cryptocurrency. Refer to `rangeFilters/volume_24h/steps` for available values.

volume_24h_min.description: Minimum 24-hour trading volume for the cryptocurrency. Refer to `rangeFilters/volume_24h/steps` for available values.

sort.description: Sorting criteria. Allowed values are `NAME_UP` (Name), `PERC1D_DN` (Chg 24h), `PERC7D_DN` (Chg 7D), `MARKETCAP_DN` (Market Cap), `VOLUME24_DN` (Vol 24h), `TOTAL_VOLUME_DN` (Total vol). Default is `PERC1D_DN`.

page.description: Page number for pagination. Default is 1.

name: get_vods
description: Fetches the VODs (Video on Demand) for a specific tournament from the League of Legends Esports API.

tournamentid.description: The ID of the tournament for which to fetch VODs. Defaults to '107458367237283414'.

name: top_competitions
description: Fetches the top competitions from the AllScores API based on the specified parameters.

name: points_point_forecast_hourly

name: coins_get_brief_chart
description: Fetches and returns a brief information chart for a specific cryptocurrency pair.

pair_id.description: The ID of the cryptocurrency pair, typically obtained from endpoints like coins/list, coins/search, or coins/list-pairs.

lang_id.description: The language ID for the response, usually obtained from the get-meta-data endpoint. Default is 1.

range.description: The time range for the chart. Allowed values are 'd' for day, 'w' for week, '1m' for one month, '1y' for one year, '5y' for five years, and 'max' for the maximum available range. Default is 'p'.

time_utc_offset.description: The UTC offset in seconds. For example, utc+8 translates to 8 * 60 * 60 = 28800 seconds. Default is 28800.

name: reviews
description: Fetches product reviews from the Otto data service using the provided parameters.

sortby.description: The criteria to sort the reviews by. Defaults to 'newest'.

description: Fetches a list of listings from the Blur API based on provided parameters.

pagesize.description: Number of listings to retrieve per page.

pagenumber.description: Page number to retrieve. Defaults to 1.

orderby.description: Order by which the listings should be sorted, either 'ASC' for ascending or 'DESC' for descending. Defaults to 'ASC'.

contractaddress.description: Specific contract address to filter listings by. Defaults to None.

description: Query baseball team coaches by team IDs using the RapidAPI baseball API.

teamids.description: A string representing one or more team IDs, separated by commas. Defaults to '145'.

sport_id.description: The ID of the sport for which to retrieve special markets.

is_have_odds.description: If specified, filters results to only include matches with available odds (True) or matches that will get odds in the future (False).

league_ids.description: The ID of the league to filter results.

event_type.description: The type of event to filter results, either 'prematch' or 'live'.

description: Fetches autocompleted addresses from the USA using the RapidAPI service.

pagesize.description: The number of episodes to fetch per page. Maximum is 20. Defaults to 20.

startindex.description: The starting index for paging. Defaults to 0.

name: titles_x_titles_by_ids
description: Fetch movie or series titles by their IMDB IDs.

description: Retrieves information for a specific game using the Free NBA API.

is_id.description: The ID of the game to retrieve.

name: stock_v2_get_analysis_report
description: Fetches detailed information about a stock based on the provided performance ID.

performanceid.description: Value of the performance ID field, typically obtained from endpoints such as /auto-complete, /get-summary, or /get-movers.

name: retrieve_drill_details
description: Retrieves details of a drill or course using the provided drill ID and RapidAPI key.

name: leaguedetails

tournamentid.description: The unique identifier for the tournament whose details are to be retrieved.

name: historical_weather_record
description: Fetches historical weather records for a specified location within a given time range.

location.description: The address or latitude, longitude of the location. Addresses can be full or partial (city, state, zip code). If using coordinates, the format should be latitude,longitude (decimal degrees).

enddatetime.description: The end date and time for the data request in ISO format (yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss) using the location's time zone.

startdatetime.description: The start date and time for the data request in ISO format (yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss) using the location's time zone.

aggregatehours.description: The interval between weather history data points in the output. Supported values are 1 (hourly) or 24 (daily).

unitgroup.description: The unit system for the output data. Supported values are 'us', 'uk', or 'metric'.

contenttype.description: The format of the output data. Supported values are 'json' or 'csv'. Default is 'csv'.

dayendtime.description: Filters the output to records within the specified end time of the day (format: HH:mm:ss). Default is '17:00:00'.

daystarttime.description: Filters the output to records within the specified start time of the day (format: HH:mm:ss). Default is '08:00:00'.

shortcolumnnames.description: If True, returns shorter, abbreviated column names. If False, returns descriptive column names. Useful for programmatic use.

name: team_squad
description: Fetch the list of players in a specified basketball team. Optionally, provide a tournament ID for national teams.

teamid.description: The ID of the basketball team.

tournamentid.description: The ID of the tournament. Required for national teams but optional for club teams.

description: Fetches all imbuements for the Vampirism (Life steal) type in the specified world.

name: v1_search
description: Performs a customizable search through a news database with various filtering and sorting options.

q.description: The search query string. This must be URL-encoded.

not_sources.description: Comma-separated list of sources to exclude from the search results.

lang.description: Language of the articles. Supported values include various language codes such as 'en', 'es', 'fr', etc. Defaults to 'en'.

search_in.description: Scope of the search within articles. Options are 'title', 'summary', or both.

sort_by.description: Criteria for sorting the search results. Options include 'relevancy', 'date', and 'rank'. Defaults to 'relevancy'.

sources.description: Comma-separated list of sources to exclude from the search results.

to.description: Date until which to search for articles.

country.description: Country to narrow the search. Supports ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 codes.

media.description: Whether to include media information in the results. Defaults to 'True'.

topic.description: Topic to restrict the search. Options include 'news', 'sport', 'tech', etc.

from_rank.description: Lower boundary of the source rank.

to_rank.description: Upper boundary of the source rank.

page_size.description: Number of articles to return per page. Maximum is 100.

page.description: Page number for paginated results. Defaults to 1.

ranked_only.description: Limit to top-ranked sources only. Defaults to 'True'.

is_from.description: Date from which to start the search.

name: get_individual_source_news
description: Fetches news articles related to police, crime, and accidents from a specified German newspaper.

newspaperid.description: The identifier of the newspaper from which to fetch news articles.

name: viewrecords
description: Fetch records from a specified Zoho Creator view or report using the Zoho Creator API.

scope.description: The scope of the request, indicating what data the request is allowed to access.

authtoken.description: Authentication token for accessing the Zoho Creator API.

applinkname.description: The unique link name of the Zoho Creator application.

zc_ownername.description: The owner name of the Zoho Creator account.

viewlinkname.description: The specific view or report from which to fetch records.

raw.description: Whether to fetch raw data. Defaults to 'True'.

criteria.description: Criteria to filter the records. Defaults to '(Country == "US")'.

startindex.description: The starting index for fetching records. Defaults to '0'.

limit.description: The maximum number of records to fetch. Defaults to '100'.

name: time_zone
description: Fetch the current time for a specified time zone in ISO-6801 format (HHmmss.SSSZ).

zoneid.description: The ID of the time zone for which the current time is to be fetched.

name: get_all_stats
description: Retrieves all basketball statistics based on the given query parameters.

page.description: The page number for pagination.

per_page.description: The number of results per page for pagination.

player_ids.description: A comma-separated string of player IDs.

dates.description: A comma-separated string of dates formatted as 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

game_ids.description: A comma-separated string of game IDs.

name: getcode_relatedcontracts
description: Fetches related contract information from the RapidAPI service.

name: getrandomwords
description: Fetch random Ukrainian words based on specified criteria from an API.

excludes.description: Letters that the word should not include. Defaults to ''.

minlength.description: Minimum length of the word. Defaults to 2.

startswith.description: Letters that the word should start with. Defaults to ''.

endswith.description: Letters that the word should end with. Defaults to ''.

amount.description: Number of requested words. Defaults to 1.

includes.description: Letters that the word should include. Defaults to ''.

name: getnfts_metadata
description: Fetches the metadata, attributes, and enclosed media of a specific NFT.

tokenid.description: The ID of the NFT token.

description: Fetches a list of soccer competitions for a given area.

name: best_players
description: Fetches the best players for a given event using the provided event ID.

event_id.description: The ID of the event for which the best players are needed.

name: coins_get_markets
description: Fetches market information for a specific cryptocurrency pair in a specified currency.

pair_id.description: The ID of the cryptocurrency pair. This value is obtained from endpoints like coins/list, coins/search, or coins/list-pairs.

time_utc_offset.description: The UTC offset in seconds. For example, UTC+8 corresponds to 28800 seconds. Defaults to 28800.

lang_id.description: The ID of the language. This value is returned from the /get-meta-data endpoint. Defaults to 1.

name: check_endpoint

name: retrieving_assets

order_direction.description: The order of the results. Can be 'asc' or 'desc'. Default is 'desc'.

limit.description: The number of assets to return. Default is 20.

collection_slug.description: The collection slug to filter assets. Default is None.

cursor.description: A cursor to paginate results. Default is None.

asset_contract_addresses.description: Specific contract addresses to filter assets. Default is None.

include_orders.description: Whether to include order information for the assets. Default is None.

collection_editor.description: The editor of the collection to filter assets. Default is None.

range.description: The range of songs to be included in the chart, with a maximum range of 1-50.

name: stations_v2_get_measurements
description: Retrieve measurements from a specific station by its ID.

is_id.description: The station ID retrieved from the /v2/auto-complete endpoint.

x_units_temperature.description: The unit for temperature, either 'fahrenheit' or 'celsius'. Default is 'celsius'.

x_units_pressure.description: The unit for pressure, either 'hg' or 'mbar'. Default is 'mbar'.

x_units_distance.description: The unit for distance, either 'miles' or 'kilometer'. Default is 'kilometer'.

x_aqi_index.description: The AQI index standard, either 'us' or 'cn'. Default is 'us'.

name: bcaa
description: Fetches Branched-Chain Amino Acids (BCAA) product details from Amazon API.

product_name_brand.description: Name or brand of the BCAA product to look up. Default is None.

name: get_imbuements_for_strike_critical_damage
description: Fetches all imbuement details for "Strike" (Critical Damage) from the specified world using the Tibia Items API.

world.description: The game world for which to fetch imbuement details.

name: disciplina_2
description: Retrieves disciplinary information for a specific student using the given authorization token.

authorization.description: The authorization token required to access the API.

name: stock_v2_get_competitors
description: Fetches the competitors of a stock based on its performance ID.

performanceid.description: The performance ID of the stock, typically retrieved from /auto-complete, /get-summary, or /get-movers endpoints.

name: number_captcha
description: Creates a numeric CAPTCHA code using the specified length and RapidAPI key.

length.description: Length of the numeric CAPTCHA, ranging from 1 to 8. Default is 4.

name: get_climate_data_by_lat_lon_or_key
description: Fetch climate data for a specific location by latitude and longitude or by city key.

lat.description: Latitude of the location. Defaults to 45.

lon.description: Longitude of the location. Defaults to -70.

key.description: City key from a list of cities. Defaults to None.

lang.description: Language of the response. Can be one of ['en', 'de', 'nl', 'fr', 'pl', 'gr', 'it', 'cn', 'ru', 'cz', 'pt', 'es']. Defaults to 'en'.

name: addresses_addressid
description: Fetch detailed information about a specific address using the given address ID.

addressid.description: The ID of the address to fetch details for.

name: gettopsportmenu
description: Fetches the top sport menu from the specified sportsbook API using provided skin name and RapidAPI key.

skinname.description: The skin name for the sportsbook. Defaults to 'betbiga'.

name: disciplina_1
description: Retrieves discipline information for a student with ID 1 from the Colegio Santa Ana API.

authorization.description: Authorization token required to access the API.

name: kitten
description: Fetches a kitten image of specified width and height using the Placekitten API.

width.description: The width of the kitten image.

height.description: The height of the kitten image.

name: teams
description: Fetches a list of teams that match the given parameters from the API.

estimatebill.description: Flag indicating whether to return a cost estimate based on the provided parameters. Defaults to None.

competitionstageid.description: The identifier of the competition stage in which teams compete. Use the 'Get Competitions' operation to find valid identifiers. Defaults to None.

countryid.description: The identifier of the country from which the teams originate. Use the 'Get Countries' operation to find valid identifiers. Defaults to None.

namelike.description: A full or partial name of a team (case-insensitive). Minimum length is 4 characters. Defaults to 'liverp'.

name: getbodypartvalues
description: Gets a set of all body part names filtered by optional query parameters.

format.description: Specifies the output type. Allowed values are CSV, HTML, XML, or JSON. Default is None.

collection.description: A label used to name a set of images collected for a specific trial or other reason. Assigned during the process of curating the data. Default is None.

bodypartexamined.description: A standard DICOM definition for the body part examined (0018x0015). Default is None.

modality.description: A standard DICOM definition for the imaging modality used (0008x0060). Default is None.

name: getcollectionvalues
description: Fetches all TCIA collection names, optionally specifying the output format.

format.description: The desired output format, which can be one of 'CSV', 'HTML', 'XML', or 'JSON'. Defaults to None.

name: get_coin_historical_metrics_by_ticker
description: Retrieve historical social media metrics for a cryptocurrency by its ticker.

date.description: Date and time in the format 'MM/DD/YYYY HH:MM AM/PM' for which to retrieve the metrics.

timeframe.description: Timeframe for the metrics. Default is '1D'. Other options include '1h' and '8h'.

name: get_all_iata_airport_codes
description: Retrieves IATA airport codes from the RapidAPI service.

code.description: An optional code to filter the airport codes. Defaults to 1.

name: historical_prices
description: Fetches a list of the high and low prices for the specified item at the given time interval.

timestep.description: The interval at which to fetch price data (e.g., 'daily', 'hourly').

itemid.description: The unique identifier for the item.

name: aliexpress_item_search_2
description: Searches for items on AliExpress with various filtering options and returns the results.

endprice.description: Maximum price of the items to be searched.

sort.description: Sorting option for the search results.

brandid.description: Brand ID(s). Multiple IDs can be separated with a comma.

page.description: Page number for pagination. Defaults to 1.

attr.description: Attribute(s) for filtering results. Multiple values are separated with semicolons.

startprice.description: Minimum price of the items to be searched.

locale.description: Locale for displaying titles and other content in the selected language.

switches.description: Additional filter switches. Multiple values can be separated with a comma.

catid.description: Category ID(s). Multiple IDs can be separated with a comma.

q.description: Search query. Defaults to 'iphone'.

loc.description: Location for filtering the search results.

currency.description: Currency for displaying the product prices.

region.description: Region for getting accurate shipping costs and promotions.

name: distance_between_airports
description: Calculates the distance between two airports given their IATA codes using the Toolbench API.

iata_airport_to.description: The IATA code of the destination airport.

iata_airport_from.description: The IATA code of the departure airport.

name: points
description: Fetches official FedExCup points earned per player for a given tournament ID and year.

tournid.description: The tournament ID for which to fetch the points.

year.description: The year for which to fetch the points.

name: rapidapigetforecastsummarybylocationname
description: Fetches the weather forecast summary for a given location name using the RapidAPI Forecast service.

locationname.description: The name of the location for which to retrieve the forecast summary.

name: get_leaderboard_rank
description: Retrieves the leaderboard rank from the Binance Futures Leaderboard API.

statisticstype.description: The type of statistics to search for.

tradetype.description: The trade type to search for. "PERPETUAL" for USD-M and "DELIVERY" for COIN-M.

periodtype.description: The period type to search for.
